text: Wewe neulue ne mulambu wa bukula budi busangisha ne bintu ebi kudi Yehowa, ulue n abi kudi muakuidi ne yeye nealue n abi ku tshioshelu
Yeye wakateka munyinyi muimpe ne bidia biakalambeye mu bianza bia Yakoba muan andi

Mikenji ya Kusombangana Talalâ Kanuhingashi muhika wakunyemena kunudi munyeme mu bianza bia mukelenge wandi; yeye ashikame n enu mu muaba udiye usungula mu umue wa misoko yenu udi utamba kumusankisha; kanumuenzedi bibi
Yeye wakatamba kulua mubanji wakadi ne bisumbu bia bimuna ne bena mudimu ba bakashi ne bena mudimu ba balume, ne tumelo ne tubalu
Pa kusakidila pa bina abio, Minisitila kavulambedi udi upeta makookeshi a pabwawo adi amwambulwisha mu midimu yende
Nunku wakatuma matabisha ku mpala kuandi, yeye wakalala butuku abu munkatshi mua tshitudilu
Ubele mikaba ku bimono, Alona ne bana bandi balume, teka bifulu ha mitu habo, bobo nebikale ne mudimu wa buakuidi tshiendelele, wewe neujidile Alona ne bana bandi balume
Midimu ya pa bwayi idi ijika padi mianda ya kutangila ijika
Bakumukamu, bakashikama mu tshibanda tshia Zalede
Badi babulombola kudi Minisitila kavulambedi, udi mwikala mfumu wa Bukalenga bunene
Bobo bakamukudimuna ne Yeye wakadi ne bualu bua kuenzela muan etu wa bakashi bu mukashi wa masandi, anyi
Nansha, nuenu bantu balume nudi mua kuya kutendelela Yehowa, bualu bua nudi basue kuenza nunku
Yehowa wakamuambila ne, Udi ne tshintu kai mu tshianza tshiebe
Nzambi wakamba ne, Buloba buvuishe bifukibua bidi ne muoyo bu mudi mishindu yabi, ya bimuna ne bintu bidi bidikoka hanshi, ne nyama yonso ya ha buloba bu mudi mishindu yai, bualu buakenjibua

Â mmatuku anakasungula bua nuenu nuambile bantu bua bikondo bia masangisha a tshijila bia kufila milambu ya kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia, mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia ne mulambu wa bukula ne mulambu wa bintu bia kunua, mulambu dituku diau mulambu dituku diau, malu â adi ha mutu ha matuku a lumingu lua Yehowa ne bintu binudi basue kufila ne ha mutu ha bintu bidi mitshima yenu musue kufila kudi Yehowa
Nzambi wakumpa mikemu yabo, ne Nzambi wakafuka mulayi wandi kudi Abalahama ne kudi Isaka ne kudi Yakoba
Bikaleye kayi mumuenzele malu â asatu, nunku mukashi udi mua kuya tshianana, kakuyi bua argent
Muntu udi kabidi mwa kudifidila mpala nkayenda kayi upitshila mu tshisumbu tshia tshidiidi to
Sala udi ne bidimu makumi tshitema nealele, anyi

Hanuadia bana, ne bana ba bana benu, hanuashala mu buloba musangu mule, hanuona mitshima yenu bua kudisongela luhingu ne tshifuanyikishi tshia tshintu, hanuenza malu mabi ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua kumufuisha tshiji; ndi mbikila diulu ne buloba bu bamanyi ba bualu kunudi lelu ne, Nenujimine ha buloba bunudi nuhiana dishiya dia Yadene tshituha tshihi; kanuena nuvudishangana matuku enu ha buloba, kadi nebanujimishe bulelela

Kanungu ka Ngikadilu wa Mbulamatadi wa ditunga, masungula a kudi bônso, bukalenga bwa dileeja mpala, bûngi bwa misangu ne lupolu lwa disomba dia mu nkwaasa wa bumfumu bwa ditunga, budikadidi bwa Tubadi, tshidiidi tshia babûngi ne bisumbu bia bakwidi ba beena mudimu kabieena mwa kuteekibwa mu mulongo wa bidi mwa kutangilula mu Dîyi dikulu to
Nzambi wakamba ne, Etshi tshidi tshimanymu tshia tshihungidi tshindi nteka hankatshi hetu ne bintu bionso bidi n enu to ne tshiendelele
Mulume neikale mubingishibue ku bubi, ne mukashi eu neadituadile bubi buandi
Ku Tabela ne Masa ne Kibelota hatawa nuakafuisha Yehowa tshiji
Ulamike tshiamu tshia or mutambe buimpe ha mutu hatshi ne ku nseke yatshi ne ku nsengu yatshi, nyungulula mubangu watshi ne or ku nseke yonso
Isalele wakashikama mu buloba bua Ejipitu, mu buloba bua Goshene bakangata bintu mu buloba abu, bakavulangana bakakumbana ba bungi
Bobo nebanusombeshe bintu, kadi nuenu kanuena nubasombesha bintu; bobo nebikale bu mitu, nuenu nenuikale bu mikila

Kanungu ka Mapa a dikolesha ngenyi,bukookeshi bwa kufuka ngenyi ne bwa kufuka bintu mu lungenyi, ne bukookeshi bwa dikebulula dia mamanya ne dia bia kwenza nabi mudimu adi majadika, kadi anu mudineemeka dia mêyi a ditunga, dia bulongama bwa bantu bônso ne dia bibidilu bia mulowu

Enzai mudimu wenu matuku asambombo; kadi dituku dia muanda mutekete ndituku dia dikisha dia kuela meji, dituku dia kujidila Yehowa, mundi yonso udi wenza mudimu dituku dia Lumingu nebamushihe bulelela
Baledi badi ne tshia kwambula bujitu bwa bâna bâbo ne kubeepulaa ku mianda yônso ya tshikisu munda anyi pambelu pa dîku
Kabieena bibweelakana mu mianda ya tshidiidi to ne bidi bikookela bamfumu badi kabayi basalayi

Bulongolodi bwa tshibidilu badi ne tshia kubulonda bwa bingenyingenyi anyi bwa bialwa kwikala mêyi bidi bitangila dikumbajangana dia Dîyi dikulu anyi dishintulula dia mêyi malongolodi pamwe ne bwa bingenyingenyi bia dîyi didi difila bukookeshi didibo baleeja kudi kanungu ka
Pa nanku, mwenji wa Dîyi ewu udi mubwêja mapa ne madikadidi aa mu Dîyi dikulu
Matuku onso a Kenana akadi bidimu nkama tshitema ne dikumi, yeye wakafua biandi
Abalama Udi Uya mu Ejipitu Tshiole tshiakadi mu buloba abu, ne Abalama wakaya mu Ejipitu bua kushikamamu bualu bua tshiole tshiakadi tshikole mu buloba abu
Wa mu tshisamba tshia Zebuluna, Ehaba muana mulume wa Helona
Tshisangilu tshia ntwadijilu badi batshilombola kudi mufundi wa mikanda wa dipoko wa buludiki bwa tshibambalu ne tshibambalu tshia Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga
Bakumuka mu Bimuna, bakashikama mu Oboto
Lamika tshiamu tshia or ku nseke yonso ya mabaya ne enza nkanu ya or ya kuelamu mitshi, lamika or ku nseke yonso ya mitshi ei

Enza bivuadi bia tshiamu bia kumusha n abi butue bua tshioshelu, ne bikasu biatshi ne malonga atshi ne bitubuidi bia kukuata n abi munyinyi, ne bihanza biatshi, enza bintu ebi bionso ne tshiamu tshia mitaku
Noa wakashila Yehowa tshioshelu, wakangata wa nyama yonso idi miakane ne wa nyunyu yonso idi miakane, wakabika bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kalua ha tshioshelu
Nakadiangatshila Bena Lewi mu miaba ya ban a bute bonso munkatshi mua Bena Isalele

Balume ne bakashi bakalua bungi buabo bakadi bitabusha mu mitshima yabo, bakalua ne tukanu tua ku matshu ne tukanu tua ku minu ne nkanu ya ku maboko ne bintu bionso bia or, muntu ne muntu wakalua ne kuha kua or kudi Yehowa
dipeta dia bintu bwa majinga a ditunga, kakuyi dinyangakaja dia bulongolodi bwa kanungu ka ;
Umiamine manyi ha tshiowelu ne ha mesa atshi, utshijidile
Kuvudi mamu webe mukuabo anyi tatu webe mukashi bilulu, bualu bua yeye wakavula bana babo bilulu, bobo nebadituadile bubi buabo
mianda ya dikolesha lungenyi ne ya manayi;
Biasua muntu wakajidila budimi kubuhikula, yeye neasakidile tshituha tshitanu ha mutu ha mushinga wakasanganabo, ne budimi nebuikale buandi
Bena Isalele nebadishimikile ntenta yabo, mundi ne muntu ku tshitudilu tshiandi, hehi ne dibendele diandi ku bisumbu biabo
Wakela di diandi kudi muhika wandi wa ku mpala ne, Hawasambakena ne Esau, mukulu anyi, ne hakukonkeye ne, Wewe udi wa nganyi
Nunku bakalua ha buihi, bakabatuala mu bikowelu biabo ku nyima kua tshitudilu, bu muakamba Mose

Wewe newangate argent ya dihikula dia Bena Isalele, uyiteke bua kukuatshisha mudimu wa mu ntenta wa kusangakena, neyikale bu tshiyulukidi tshia Bena Isalele ku mesu kua Yehowa bua kuhikula kua mioyo yenu

Muakuidi neabifile kudi Yehowa, neafile mulambu wandi wa kubuikila n au bubi ne mulambu wandi wa kuosha ha kahia neafile tshimpanga bu mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala kudi Yehowa ne tshisaka tshia mampa adi kâyi ne luevene, muakuidi neafile kabidi mulambu wa bukula ne mulambu wa bintu bia kunua
Hashishe Bena Amaleka bakahueka ne Bena Kanâna bakadi bashikama mu mikuna, bakabahita bukole, bakabihata tô ne ku Homa

Mose wakamba ne, Netuye ne bana bakese ne bantu banunu, ne bana betu ba balume ne bana betu ba bakashi, netuye ne mikoko yetu ne ngombe yetu, bualu bua tudi ne bualu bua kudia bidia ku mesu kua Yehowa

Kanungu ka Bibambalu biônso bibidi bidi bitwilangana mu Tshisangilu Tshinene pa mianda eyi: a lwendu lwa kulonda mu diakajilula dia Dîyi dikulu bilondeshila tunungu twa too ne ku twa Dîyi dikulu edi ; b dianyisha dia diludika ne dikuba dia ditunga pa lukasa kudi bilwilu ne dieelangana dia mvita bilondeshila tunungu twa ne twa Dîyi dikulu edi ; c diteeleja dia muyuki wa Mulombodi wa ditunga pa ngikadilu wa mianda ya Ditunga bilondeshila kanungu ka ka Dîyi dikulu edi ; d diteeka dia bantu basatu beena Kabadi komekela mianda ya Dîyi dikulu bilondeshila bulongolodi bwa kanungu ka ka Dîyi dikulu edi
Nuye bienu ne muntu wa mu tshisamba muntu wa mu tshisamba, muntu yonso udi ku mutu kua nsubu wa batatu abo
Enza mpandu ne tulonga tukese bia tsiutekelu ne or mutambe buimpe
Mua Kuenzela Bahika Ek
Nenkuvudishangane ba bungi, nenkuvuishe bisamba bia bungi, bakelenge nebaledibue munda muebe
Neutshiteke hankatshi ha tshitendelelu ne tshioshe lu, newelemu mai
Mai akavulangana ha buloba matuku lukama ne makumi atanu

Luhehele luakaheha kudi Yehowa, diakalua ne nyunyu ya nkuadi ku mai manene, luakayihonesha hehi ne tshitudilu, bu luendu lua dituku dimue ku luseke elu ne luendu lua dituku dimue ku luseke lukuabo, yakanyunguluka tshitudilu ku nseke yonso, yakalembelela mulelu mukese bu coudées ibidi
Tangila, Lebeka udi ku mpala kuebe, umuangate, uye n andi, yeye neikale mukashi wa muana mulume wa mukelenge webe bu muakamba Yehowa

Yeye wakamba ne, Tangilai, ba kelenge banyi ndi nnusengelela ne Luai kunu, nubuele mu nsubu wa muntu wenu, nulalemu butuku ebu, nuvuwe makasa enu, hashishe, ne nubike dinda dionso, nenuye mu nshila wenu Bobo bakamba ne, Nansha, netuikale mu misesu butuku ebu buonso

Bualu ebu nebuikale mukenji kunudi tshiendelele mu dituku dia dikumi mu ngondo wa muanda mutekete nenujinge mu mitshima yenu, kanuenji mudimu, nansha bantu baledibue mu nsubu yenu nansha benyi badi munkatshi muenu, bualu bua edi ndituku didibo banubuikidila bubi buenu bua kunulengesha nunku nenuikale balengeshibue ku mibi yenu yonso ku mpala kua Yehowa
Meme tshiena mumanye Yehowa ne tshiena ndekela Bena Isalele
Enza tshitekelu ne bintu ebi bionso ne ntalanta umue wa or mutambe buimpe
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Olola tshianza tshiebe ha buloba bua Ejipitu, bua kutuala mikumbi mu buloba bua Ejipitu, neyidie bintu bionso biakashala ku mabue a nvula
Bakayila ku luseke lua sude, bakafua ku Hebelone, ne Ahimana ne Sheshai ne Talemai, bana ba Anaka bakadimu
Difutu diakumuka ku mutu kua Ntenta, ne tangila, Miyama wakadi mûle tente ne disama dia nsudi mitoke to Alona wakatangila ne Mîyama wakadi mûle tente ne nsudi
Wakimana biandi hankatshi ha bantu bafue ne bantu bakatshidi ne muoyo, ne disama diakashika
Nenudie bidia bia disanka dia mbingu ku mesu kua Yehowa hanuahuola bintu, ne hanuasangisha bintu kunshikidilu kua tshidimu

Genese Yosefe Udi Udimanyisha kudi Bana Babo Hashishe, Yosefe kakamanya mua kudikanda kudishikunka ku mesu kua bantu bakimana ha buihi n andi, wakamba ne, Numushe bantu bonso kundi Nansha muntu mukuabo wakashala n andi hakadimanyisha Yosefe kudi bana babo
Badi ne tshia kupeta difutu dia ndekeelu wa mudimu dikumbanangana ne dia ngondo isambombo ya mudimu
Au mmeku a Yisakâ, bungi buabo buakabalabo buakadi binunu makumi asambombo ne binai ne nkama isatu

Biajidileye Yehowa budimi buakasumbeye budi kabuyi bua buhianyi buandi, muakuidi neamubadile mushinga uwakatuangana n andi ku tshidimu tshia disanka dinene, yeye neafue mushinga uwakatuangana handi dituku adi bu tshintu tshia tshijila kudi Yehowa
Nenuenzele nyama wandi wa mpunda nunku kabidi, ne bilulu biandi; nenuenzele bintu bionso bia mukuenu biakajimisheye ne wewe wakabiangula, kanubisokoki
Wewe newenzele Alona ne bana bandi balume bu mudi mei onso anakukuambila, ubajidile matuku muanda mutekete
Dutelonone Matuku a Masanka Majalame Ek

Ndi nkutendekena ne, Wangata bintu biebe bia bule mbi, mukulu wa mikete ne buta buebe, uye mu tshisuku, unkebele ntole undambile munyinyi wa dihembu undi musue Ulue n au kundi, nengudie, bua mutshima wanyi ukuvudishile disanka diambedi tshiyi muanze kufua
Kadi hakatshiabu Bena Isalele bonso bakatontolola Mose ne Alona ne, Nuenu nuakushiha bantu ba Yehowa
Dikosolola dia teletwale munda mwa polovensa badi badifila kudi dîyi dilongolodi
Wewe newenze nunku bua kubalengesha ubamiamine mai a kubalengesha n au ku bubi, babeye mubidi wabo wonso ne dihaya, buvuwe bilulu biabo ne badilengeshe
Mose wakamanyisha Yehowa mei a bantu
Bule bua tshilulu tshimue buakadi coudées makumi abidi ne muanda mukulu, ne butshiama buatshi buakadi coudées mai, bilulu bionso biakadi ne budi lumue
Tusangishe bintu bia kudia mu bidimu ebi bimpe, tubiteke mu bianza bia Palo bua bantu kudiabo mu bimenga, tubilame bimpe
dikuba dia bantu mu ditunga;
Mpa buloba mpa makenga eee Kwà nganyì wètù kutwaya eee Kudi kakuyi makenga eee Bwà kudia ka kwena
Bantu ba mu meku a bana balume ba Kohata nebashikame ku luseke lua ku sude
Ei idi ndelanganyi ya Esau dina diandi dikuabo Edome
Baleleshi bakambila Palo ne, Bualu bua bakashi ba Bena Ebelu kabena bu bakashi ba Bena Ejipitu bobo badi ne bukole bua kudilelela, ne bakamana kulela diambedi baleleshi kabayi banze kulua kudibo

Bakalua ne bimuna biabo kudi Yosefe, ne Yosefe wakashintakasha n abo bia kudia ku tubalu tuabo ne ngombe yabo ne mikoko yabo ne nyama ya mpunda, yeye wakabadisha tshidimu tshijima ne bintu bia kudia biakashintakasheye ku bimuna biabo, Hakashika tshidimu atshi, bakalua kudiye tshidimu tshibidi, bakamuambila ne, Katuena tusokoka mukelenge wetu bualu tuakashiki sha argent yetu yonso, ne bimuna bietu mbia mukelenge wetu kabidi kakuena tshintu tshidi tshishala ku mesu kua mukelenge wanyi, anu mibidi yetu ne maloba etu
Muntu yonso udi udia mashi nebamumushe munkatshi mua bana babo
Bûngi bwa batshipwita ba ditunga pamwe ne mushindu wa kubasungula ne kusungudibwa badi babileeja kudi dîyi didi ditangila masungulangana
midimu ya mbulamatadi mu polovensa ne mu misoko;
Wewe neubikile bantu bonso badi ne mitshima ya lungenyi, bantu banakûsha ne lungenyi tente, bua bobo batelele Alona bilulu bia kumujidila, bua yeye ankuatshile mudimu wa buakuidi
Muntu wakanuisha ne kahia neuvuwe bilulu biandi ne mubidi wandi ne mai, ne yeye neikale bu muntu udi kayi muakane tô ne ku dilolo
Mu tshiota tshikuabo nakatangila miehu muanda mutekete minene miakane midiunde ku lubalabala lumue
Buswikakaji bwa bukalenga bwa polovensa budi ne tshia kwangata bweena mpala bwa polovensa ne mushinga
Eleazâ, muana wa balume wa Alona, wakabaka umue wa bana ba bakashi ba Putiele, yeye wakamulelela Pinehasa
Isalele wakabisha luendu luandi, wakashimika ntenta yandi ku nyima kua tshibumba tshinene tshia Ede
Wakamukudimuna ne, Aba mbana bakuha Nzambi muntu webe mu luse

Mu matuku au bantu banene ba nfiondo bakadi ha buloba, ne hakaya bansongalume ba bantu ba Nzambi kudi bansongakashi ba bantu ba tshianana, bakalela n abo bana Bobo bakadi bantu banene ba kale ne ba butumbi
Genese Hashishe Yosefe wakaya, wakambila Palo ne, Tatu wanyi ne bana betu bakulua ku buloba bua Kanâna ne mikoko yabo ne bimuna biabo ne bintu bionso bidibo n abi, mona, badi mu buloba bua Goshene
Yakoba wakavudishila Palo disanka, wakumuka ku mesu kua Palo
Nenufile mpumbu wa mbushi umue bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi ne bana balume ba mikoko babidi ba tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala
Yosefe wakadi muntu muimpe mubidi ne mpala Ku nyima kua malu au mukashi wa mukelenge wandi wakananga mesu andi kudi Yosefe, wakamuambila ne, Ulale n anyi
Ekesode Musambu wa Mose ne wa Miyama Mose ne Bena Isalele balambila Yehowa musambu eu, bakamba ne, Nengimbile Yehowa musambu, bualu bua yeye wakatamba bukole ne butumbi buandi
Biasanganabo muntu udi wiba muan abo umue wa Bena Isalele, udi umuenza bu muhika, anyi udi umuhana, hashishe nebashihe muibi: nunku nenûmusbe malu mabi munkatshi muenu
Badi mwa kukanyika bantu bwa kwenzabo busalayi mu mushindu udi mêyi a ditunga mafunda

Buela mu buatu ne bintu bibidi bia tshintu tshionso tshidi ne muoyo, bua kusungila mioyo ya bintu, buela ne mulume ne mukashi ba bintu bionso, ba nyunyu ne ba bimuna ne ba tshintu tshionso tshidi tshidikoka hanshi, bu mudi mishindu yabi, buela ne bintu bibidi bia bintu bionso bua kusungila mioyo yabi
Esau wakamba ne, Witabushe bua bantu banyi bakuabo bashale n ebe Yakoba wakamukonka ne, Bua tshinyi

Padibio amu bikole,badi mwa kuleepesha tshipungu too ne ku matuku kaayi mapita pa lukama ne makumi abidi kudi Kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu padibo bakamanyisha kudi Kasumbu ka ditunga Kadikadile komekela mianda ya Masungulangana
Ahiezê, muana mulume wa Amishadai, mukelenge wa bana ba Dana, wakafua bintu dituku dia dikumi

Kadi bikala mulambu wandi wa kuditshiha n au anyi mulambu udiye ufila ku disua diandi, yeye neaudie mu dituku didiye ûfila ne tshituha tshidi tshishale yeye neatshidie makelela, kadi bikala tshituha tshia munyinyi wa mulambu tshishale tô ne ku dituku disatu, nebatshioshe mu kahia
Benyi badi munkatshi muenu nebabandile ku mutu kuenu, ne nuenu nenuhuekele
Wakalua ne tshimpanga tshia kuosha ha kahia, Alona ne bana bandi bakatentekasha bianza biabo ha mutu ha tshimpanga
Kalongu kisâtu : Bidi bitangila makayi ne mapangakana
Nenuikale ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusambakena munya ne butuku tô matuku muanda mutekete, nutumikile dî dia Yehowa bua kanufu bienu, bualu bua Yehowa wakangambila nunku

Muakuidi nele dî diandi bua kumusha bintu bionso bia mu nsubu diambedi muakuidi kayi muanze kubuela bua kutangila disama, bua bintu bionso bia mu nsubu kabilu bu bintu bidi kabiyi biakane, ku nyima muakuidi neabuele bua kutangila mu nsubu
buludiki bwa bungenda mushinga ne matunga meenyi;
Abalahama wakasemena ha buihi, wakamukonka ne, Neushihe bantu bakane ne bantu babi hohamue, anyi

kujadika dikombolangana mu mungalaata Ke bwaalu kayi, badi mwa kwambulula butumibwa bwa Mulombodi wa Ditunga anu musangu umwe; ne kabidi yêye mwine udi weenza midimu yeende ya mukubi wa dîyi dikulu, wa budikadidi bwa Ditunga, wa bujima bwa ditunga, wa budikookeshi bwa ditunga, wa diumvwangana ne ndondo ne matunga makwabo; udi weenza midimu yeende ya muludiki ne musonsolodi wa lwendu lwîmpe lwa Bishimikidi bia Ditunga mwikale mubwêjamu Bukalenga bunene ku dîsu dikole dia tshimamwende wa bukalenga
Yeye neatenteke tshianza tshiandi ha mutu ha mukoko wa mulambu wandi, neanshihe kudibo bashihela mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia
Yakoba wakadi ne Lakele tshiji, wakakonka ne, Meme ndi bu Nzambi udi mujidike munda muebe ne, Kuledi, anyi
Yakoba Udi Unyema Labana Hashishe Yakoba wakabika, wakateka bakashi bandi ne bana bandi ha nyima ha tumelo
Tshihungidi tshia Abalahama ne Abimeleke Mu tshikondo atshi Abimeleke ne Pikola, kamanda ka masalayi andi, bakambila Abalahama ne, Nzambi udi n ebe mu malu onso audi wenza

Yehowa neanunzuluile masanka adiye n au mu diulu bua kunulokeshila nvula ha buloba mu tshikondo tshia nvula, ne bua kunuvudishila disanka mu malu anudi nuenza ne bianza bienu; nuenu nenusombeshe bisamba bia bungi bintu, kadi nuenu kanuena nusomba bintu kudibo
Nuenu nenutumikile mei anyi ne mikenji yanyi, nenubienze, nenushikame mu buloba talala
Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neateke milau ei yonso ham bidi ha bena lukuna ne badi n enu tshiji, bakadi banukengesha
Wewe neuteke mabue abidi ha bilulu bia ha maha ha efoda; mabue au neikale bu tshivulukidi tshia Bena Isalele, Alona neatuale mena abo ku mesu kua Yehowa ha maha andi abidi bu tshivulukidi
Masanka Majalame Ek

Kanungu ka Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka ne tshibambalu tshia batshipwita mukulumpa badi babilombola ku tshimwe ku tshimwe kudi Bilo bia bantu mwanda mutekete bikalamu kudi: a mulombodi; b mulombodi tshindonda wa kumpala; c mulombodi tshindonda mwibîdi; d mulubudi; e mulubudi tshindonda; f mutangidi wa maalu a lupetu ne bulongolodi bwa munda; g mutangidi wa maalu a lupetu ne bulongolodi bwa munda tshindonda

Bena Gada ne Bena Lubena bakamba ne Netuenze bu mudi Yehowa wambila bantu bandi

Dutelonone Mose Udi Ubavuluisha Dî Diaka balaya Yehowa ku Holeba Â mmei akambila Mose Bena Isalele dishiya dia Yadene mu tshihela mu Alabâ tshitangilangane ne Sufa, hankatshi ha Palana ne Tofele ne Labana ne Heselota ne Dizababa
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Kanudi dianyi dia ngombe anyi dia mukoko anyi dia mbushi
Mabue neikale dikumi ne abidi bu bungi bua mena a Bena Isalele, nebafunde dina dia tshisamba ne tshisamba tshia Bena Isalele ha dibue ne ha dibue
Kanyangishi bana bandi munkatshi mua bana babo nansha, bualu bua meme ndi Yehowa wakamujidila

Mesu enu akatangila bualu buakenza Yehowa bualu bua Bâla peô; Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakashiha balume bonso munkatshi muenu bakalonda Bâla peô; kadi nuenu bakalamata Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, nudi ne muoyo lelu eu
Nunku bobo neboweshe bianza biabo ne makasa abo ne mai, bua bobo kabafu, etshi ntshilele tshiabo tshiendelele kudiye ne bana bandi badi banulonda ku nyima ku bikondo biabo bionso
Mpunda wakambila Belâma ne, Meme tshiena mpunda webe uwakenda ha nyima n andi matuku ebe onso tô ne katataka, anyi

Ukuate mudimu webe matuku asambombo, wenza midimu yebe yonso, kadi dituku dia muanda mutekete didi Lumingu lua Yehowa, Nzambi webe Dituku adi kuenji mudimu, nansha wewe nansha muan ebe wa balume nansha muan ebe wa bakashi nansha muhika webe mulume nansha muhika webe mukashi nansha bimuna biebe nansha muenyi udi ku mbelu kuebe, bualu bua Yehowa wakafuka diulu ne buloba ne mai manene ne bintu bionso bidimu matuku asambombo, wakikisha biandi dituku dia muanda mutekete, nunku Yehowa wakalengesha dituku dia muanda mutekete, wakadijidila
Mose wakatuma bantu bua kutentekelabo buloba bua Yazê, ne bakanyenga misoko ei kabidi, bakihata Bena Amole bakadimu

Mose wakasungula balume ba lungenyi lule ba munkatshi mua Bena Isalele, wakabateka bakokeshi ha mutu ha bantu, bakokeshi ba bantu tshinunu ne ba bantu lukama ne ba bantu makumi atanu ne ba bantu dikumi

Olodonase udi uteeka Mbulamatadi wa tshimpitshimpi anyi mbulamatadi wa bilwilu udi ujika bwenzeji, kakuyi ditontolola, panyima pa dijika dia tshipungu tshidibu bateeka mu kalongu kisâtu ka kanungu aka, pa kumbusha pikala Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka ne tshia batshipwita bukulumpe, pa dilomba dia Mulombodi wa ditunga ne dipangadika dia Tshipangu tshia baminisitila, bifila dianyisha dia kulunguluja bwa mpoolu milondangana ya matuku dikumi ne ataanu
Wakenza tshintu tshia kuteka ha mutu ha nsubu ne biseba bia bimpanga bitua mu mai makunze kunzû ne biseba bia nyama ya nkonge bia kuteka ha mutu hatshi
Bakasangisha tshiamu tshia mitaku bu ntalanta makumi muanda mutekete, ne nshekele binunu bibidi ne nkama mai
Bintu bionso bia mu mai bidi kabiyi ne mialala ne mabamba nebikale bintu bibi kunudi
Bakaya ne dibendele dia tshitudilu tshia Dana, bobo bakadi halua ku nyima kua bakuabo, bakaya ku luendu luabo ku bisumbu biabo, ne Ahiezê, muana mulume wa Amishadai, wakadi ku mutu kuabo
Nyama yonso udi wenda ne makama udi mubi kunudi, muntu yonso udi ulenga tshianza ham bidi hai neikale ne bukoya tô ne dilolo
Alona neafile mbushi wakakuatabo kudi nshobo wa Yehowa bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi

Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Nuangate mpumbu wa mbushi bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi, nusungulule kana ka ngombe ne kana ka mukoko bia tshidimu tshimue, bidi kabiyi ne tshitema, bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia, angata kabidi mulume wa ngombe ne tshimpanga bu mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala bua kubishiha ku mesu kua Yehowa ne mulambu wa bukula busangisha ne manyi, bualu bua Yehowa neamueneke kunudi lelu
Bamfumu ba Ditunga ba kale bavwabo basungula badi batshipwita bakulumpa bwa kashidi
Kanungu ka Muntu yônso udibo bakwata badi ne tshia kumwambila diakamwe tshidibo bamukwatshila ne tshivwabo bamufundila, ne biônso abi, mu mwakulu udiye umvwa
Katataka ya kuebe, nakadi ngelangana meji bua kukuha butumbi bunene, kadi mona, wewe wakubavudishila butumbi ebu
Hakunvua Abalama lumu ne, Bakaya ne muan etu, yeye wakaya ne bahika bandi bakadiye mueyemene bakadi baledibue mu nsubu muandi, nkama isatu ne dikumi ne muanda mukulu, wakabihata to ne ku Dana
Kahia bakahatuka kudi Yehowa, kakosha balume nkama ibidi ne makumi atanu bakadi bafila musenga wa manananshi
Mudimu wa Tshipwita wa ditunga udi utwadija padibo bitabuuja makookeshi enda kudi Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita ne udi ufika ku ndekeelu padibo babanjija Tshibambalu tshipiatshipia
Yai bienu lubilu kudi tatu wanyi, numuambile ne, Muan ebe Yosefe wakamba ne, Nzambi wakanvuisha mukelenge wa buloba bua Ejipitu buonso, Ulue biebe kundi, kujanguluki
Yehowa wakulua dî dia Bena Isalele, wakafua Bena Kanâna mu bianza biabo, bakabashiha ne misoko yabo yonso, ne dina dia muaba au diakadi Hôma
Bena Isalele Bafile Bintu kudi Yehowa Ek
Lota waka luhuka kudibo wakinshila tshibi ku nyima kuandi
Budikookeshi Dinyooka dia lukanu Dinyooka Teletwale Dibandila dia matunga ne bintu Mianda ya bia kwenza nabi mudimu Tshinyangu, tshimvundu Tshisabu Kabumwe, bobumwe Viza Dianyishibwa
Muntu nansha umwe kabena mwa kumwenzeja mudimu wa ku bukole anyi mumukanyika to

mu Kasumbu kakese kadikadile komekela mianda ya masungulangana mu ditunga kadi ne mudimu wa kulongolola ngenzelu wa masungulangana nangananga didifundisha dia basungudianganyi, dilama dia fishi wa masungulangana, midimu ya masungulangana, ya dibadika dia mêyi ne ya dikonkoloja beena ditunga
Kanuakadia mampa, kanua kanua nvinyo anyi maluvu makole, bua nuenu numanye ne, Meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Bana ba Yakoba Kul
Nsongakashi wakaya lubilu, wakambila ba mu nsubu wa mamu andi malu au
Binuamba mu mitshima yenu ne, Bisamba ebi bidi bituhita bunene, nembihate munyi

Ebi mbintu binudi mua kuangata kudibo or ne argent ne tshiamu tshia mitaku, ne bilulu bia bleu ne bilulu bifikuluke ne bilulu bikunze kunzû ne bilulu bia lin ne miosa ya mbushi, ne biseba bia bimpanga bina mu mai makunze, ne biseba bia nkonge ne mutshi wa acacia, ne manyi a muinda, manananshi adibo bela mu manyi a kulaba ham bidi, ne manyi adi atua dihembu, mabue a mushinga mukole adibo bateka mu efoda ne mu tshiamu tshidibo baluata ha tshiadi
Tshintu tshidi mua kuhita Yehowa bukole, anyi
Mose ne Alona bakumuka ku mesu kua bantu, bakaya ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusambakena, bakatua mpala yabo hanshi
Kusombuela kudi kuanyi, ne difutu kabidi, halua dituku didi dikasa diabo difinuka, bualu bua dituku dia dikenga diabo diakalua, ne malu akadi ha kulua kudibo nealue lubilu

Milambu ya Kubuikila n ai Bubi Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Biasambuka muntu ku mikenji bua kuenza bualu bubi ku mpukahuka mu malu a tshijila a Yehowa, yeye neafile mulambu wa disambuka dia mikenji kudi Yehowa, tshimpanga tshidi katshiyi ne tshitema mushinga wa nshekele wa mu nsubu wa Nzambi bu mulambu wa disambuka dia mikenji
Bakenza tukanu tua or tuakadi tuhindakana bu muonshi
Alona wakadi ne bidimu lukama ne makumi abidi ne bisatu hakafueye mu mukuna wa Hô
Kapangu ka Kulu ka disungidila ditunga badi bakaludika kudi Mulombodi wa Ditunga ne padiye kayi kôku anyi yêye mwikala mupumbishibwe, kudi Minisitila kavulambedi

Anyi bikala munyinyi eu mubishe muandamuke muteke tô kabidi nunku yeye nealue kudi muakuidi, muakuidi neamutangile, ne biandamukeye mutoke tô, nunku muakuidi neambile bantu ne, Muntu eu wakadi ne nsudi udi muakane, ne yeye neikale muakane
Ubatelele mihanu ya lin ya kubuikila butaka buabo, mihanu neyikale ku tshimono mifike to ne ku bibelu
Padi tshipungu etshi tshipita, badi bashintakaja ngenyi pa malomba a kwenzeja dîyi aa
Bualu bua nakumana kukulongoluela nsubu ne muaba wa tumelo tuebe
Shaula wakafua ne, Balahanana, muana wa Akabo, wakadia bukelenge bua ndi
Wakenzela tshioshelu munyingu wa tshiamu tshia mitaku, wakatekeye munda mua mibangu ya ku mutu kua tshioshelu hankatshi, mu bule buatshi

Bana ba Dana ku bikondo biabo, ku meku abo, ku nsubu ya batatu abo, bungi bua mena abo ku bidimu makumi abidi to ne ha mutu, bonso bakamanya mua kuya mu nvita, bakabala ba mu tshisamba tshia Dana binunu makumi asambombo ne bibidi ne nkama muanda mutekete
Tshisangilu Tshinene tshidi tshianyisha Tuludiki twatshi twa munda

Bikala Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, muleheshe matshika enu, bu muakudi tshiheye kudi bankambua benu, bianuheye buloba buonso buakalayeye bankambua benu; binuatumikila mukenji eu, undi munuelele lelu, binuawenza, bua kusua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne bua kuenda mu nshila yandi; hashishe nenusungule misoko mikuabo isatu ha mutu ha misoko ei isatu
Wakatuangana bilulu bitanu ha buabi, bilulu bitanu ha buabi
Hakaleha bidimu nkama mai ne makumi asatu, mu dituku adi mene mene, bisumbu bionso bia bantu ba Yehowa bakaluhuka mu buloba bua Ejipitu
Mabue a nvula akashika bintu bionso bia mu buloba bua Ejipitu biakadi mu budimi, ne bantu ne nyama, mabue a nvula akashika midioko yonso ya mu budimi ne mitshi yonso
Nunku wewe neweleshe mpungi bikole dituku dia dikumi mu ngondo wa muanda mutekete, mu dituku dia kubuikila bubi bua bantu wewe neweleshe mpungi kuonso mu buloba buenu
Kadi Bena Lewi nebashimike ntenta yabo minyunguluke nsubu wa tshitendelelu, bua mulau kaukuatshi Bena Isalele Bena Lewi nebabale nsubu wa tshitendelelu

Yeye neamukose bituha ne mutu ne dianyi, ne muakuidi neabilonge ha nkunyi idi mu kahia kadi ha mutu ha tshioshelu, kadi neuvuwe bintu bia munda ne bioku ne mai, ne muakuidi neoshile bintu bionso ha tshioshelu bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia bu tshintu tshidi tshitua dihembu kudi Yehowa

Bintu bionso biakangatabo kudi bena nvita biakadi mikoko binunu nkama isambombo ne makumi muanda mutekete ne bitanu, ne ngombe binunu makumi muanda mutekete ne bibidi, ne nyama ya mpunda binunu makumi asambombo ne tshinunu tshimue, ne bakashi binunu makumi asatu ne bibidi badi kabayi banze kumanyibua kudi balume

Lufu ne Kujikibua bia Yakoba Bonso aba badi bisamba bia Bena Isalele dikumi ne bibidi, a mmei akabambila tatu wabo, hakabavudishileye disanka, muntu ne muntu wakadi ne disanka diakamuvudishileye n adi
Bena Isalele bakavula bintu bia kudilengesha n abi ku mukuna wa Holeba tô ne ku mpala kuakadibo baya
Badi ne tshia kumwambila diakamwe mapa ende
Abalama wakamba ne, Mukelenge Yehowa, wewe neumpe tshintu kai, bualu bua meme tshiena ne muana, ne muhianyi wa bintu bianyi udi Elieze, muena Damaseke
Padiye ufika ku ndekelu wa tshipungu tshidibu bamukosela, Mfumu wa Ditunga udi ushaala mu nkwaasa too ne padibo bashikika mfumu mupiamupia udibo basungula mu nkwaasa
Lewitiki Kulama kua Muinda Ek
Wakindila matuku muanda mute kete makuabo, waka tuma nyunyu wa nkutshi kabidi, ne nyunyu kakahingana kudiye kabidi tshiendelele
Batangidi ba Mudimu Ebu mbungi bua bintu bia mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu biakabalabo bu muakamba Mose biakakuatshila Bena Lewi mu mudimu wabo, mu bukokeshi bua Itama, muana mulume wa Alona, muakuidi

Bana balume ba Melali bakabalabo ku meku abo ne ku nsubu ya batatu abo, ba bidimu makumi asatu to ne ku bidimu makumi atanu, buonso buabo bakadi benza mudimu mu ntenta wa kusambakena, bakabalabo ku meku abo bakadi binunu bisatu ne nkama ibidi

Nenuikale mu bitandatanda matuku muanda mutekete; bantu bonso hakalelabo mu Isalele nebashikame mu bitandatanda bua kumanyisha bantu ba mu bikondo bienu bionso ne, Bena Isalele bakashikama mu bitandatanda hanakahatuka n abo mu buloba bua Ejipitu, meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu

Kadi bikaleye mumutahe kayi ne tshiji, anyi bikaleye muele tshintu, tshimukume, kayi mumualamine mu nshila, anyi bikaleye mumukume ne dibue kayi mumutangile, ne mumushihe, kayi muikale n andi lukuna, kayi musue kunuenzela bibi, nebalumbulule tshilumbu tshia mukuna wa muntu ne musombuedi, bu mudi mikenji ei yamba, nebasungile mushihi mu tshianza tshia musombuedi, nebamuhingishe ku musoko wa kunyemena, kuakunyemeneye, ne yeye neashikamemu to ne hafua muakuidi munene, udi ne manyi a tshijila mela ha mutu
Bakatamba kuikala n andi lukuna bualu bua bilota biandi ne bua mei andi
Yeye wakamba ne, Kanuena mua kuhita

Ngikadiku wa bimwangalaji bia ngumu bia Mbulamatadi udi mulejibwa kudi dîyi didi dishindika ngambilu wa bwaalu pa bwaalu, dibenga kutwa ku tshia muntu ne tshibûngi tshia mmwenenu ya maalu mu dilongolola ne dimvwangalaja dia ngumu
Bualu ebu buakusankisha bimpe, nakasungula balume dikumi ne babidi, muntu ku tshisamba muntu ku tshisamba
Bialala mukashi ne nyama, nebashihe mukashi ne nyama kabidi, mashi abi neikale ham bidi habi
Bana ba balume ba Kohata: Amalama ne Yisehâ ne Hebelone ne Uziele, bidimu bia Kohata biakadi lukama ne makumi asatu ne bisatu
Yeye neashihe muana wa ngombe ku mesu kua Yehowa, ne bana balume ba Alona bakuidi nebaye ne mashi, nebamiamine mashi ku tshioshelu tshidi ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusangakena
Nudilengeshe nunku, nuikale bantu ba tshijila bualu bua meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Bulelela, kakuena muena muhongo munkatshi mua bana ba Yakoba, kakuena batempi ba mbuku munkatshi mua Bena Isalele, katataka nebambile bana ba Yakoba ne Bena Isalele ne, Yehowa wakuenza tshinyi
Kadi yeye wakabambila ne, Nudi bafuba, nudi bafuba, ne bua bualu ebu nudi nuamba ne, Witabushe bua tuye kushihela Yehowa nyama
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Meme ndi Yehowa wakakumusha mu Ula wa Bena Kasada, bua kukuha buloba ebu bua kubuhiana
Nakatangila ne monai, nuakenzela Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bubi; nuakadienzela kana ka ngombe ne biamu biakatulabo; nuakadi nusesuka lubilu mu nshila wakanulesha Yehowa
Muntu ne muntu wakadi ne tshiamu tshia argent ne tshia mitaku wakalua n abi bu kuha kua Yehowa, muntu yonso wakadi ne mitshi ya acacia yakadibo mua kuenza n ai mudimu wakalua n ai
Kanusangishi tumuma tuonso ludi mu madimi enu, kanuambudi tumuma tuakahona hanshi mu madimi enu, nushiye bintu ebi bia kukuatshisha n abi bahele ne benyi meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Kanungu ka Kabeena mwa kumbusha anyi kutanakaja muntu, yêye kayi mudiswîle, ne nzuji udi mêyi ne mikandu imupeesha
Mitshi ai neyikale mu nkanu ya mushete, kayumuki nansha
Nzambi wakamba ne, Mulu muikale hankatshi ha mai a ha buloba ne mai a mu diulu
Neubueshe mitshi ai mu nkanu idi ku nseke ya mushete, bua kutuala n ai mushete
Kanungu ka Nkoselu wa tshilumbu yônso badi bamufunda mu mukanda ne bumvwija tshidibo bakosela nanku
Bikala mulambu wa mundi wa kumuvuisha n au ditalala wa munkatshi mua mikoko wa kudia kudi Yehowa, neafue mulume nansha mukashi udi kayi ne tshilema
Kadi bantu badi mu buloba abu badi bakole, misoko yabo idi ne mpangu ya mabue, ne idi minene be; ne bualu bukuabo, tuakamonamu bana ba Anaka
Nunku Yosefe wakafua, wakadi ne bidimu lukama ne dikumi bakalongolola tshitalu tshiandi, bakatshiteka mu mushete mu Ejipitu
Wakenza mabaya abidi a kuteka ku matumba a nsubu a ku nyima
Yeshuluna, kakuena mukuabo bu Nzambi, udi ushikama biandi mu diulu bua kukukuatshisha: bulengele buandi budi ku mutu kua matutu
Kunengi bua kufila bintu bia kunowa kudi Nzambi, ne nvinyo ûdi ukama

Kudisongidi luhingu anyi tshifuanyikishi tshia tshintu tshia mu diulu anyi tshia tshintu tshia hanshi ha buloba anyi tshia tshintu tshia mu mai adi muinshi mua buloba: kubmamina, kubitendeledi; bua meme Yehowa, Nzambi webe, ndi bianyi Nzambi wa mukau; ntu ngatumina bana ba tshihungu tshisatu anyi tshinai badi n anyi lukuna mibi ya batatu abo; ntu ngalesha bihungu tshinunu badi bansue ne badi benza mikenji yanyi luse lujalame
Biasua muena nsubu kuhikula nsubu wandi, yeye neasakidile tshituha tshitanu tshia mushinga wa nsubu ha mutu hau, ne nsubu neikale wandi
Meme Yehowa, tshiena ngenza malu â, anyi
Nenuikale ne disanka hanuabuela mu nsubu, nenuikale ne disanka hanualuhukamu
Badi mwa kubikilamu mwena bukalenga bunene mukwabo yônso
Hakumukabo mu musoko, kabayi banze kuya kule, Yosefe wakambila mulami wandi ne, Bika biebe, ulonde balume aba ne hawabaheta, ubakonke ne, Bualu kai nuakashintakasha malu mabi ku malu mimpe
Kanulu kudi Yehowa ne mulambu wa bukula budi busangisha ne luevene, kanuoshi luevene anyi buitshi bu mulambu wa kuoshila Yehowa
Nuakulekela Dibue diakanufuka, nuakuhua Nzambi wakanulelesha muoyo

Kanungu ka Tshipangu tshia mianda ya bubanji ne ya nsombelu wa bweena ditunga tshidi ne mudimu wa kufila ngenyi pa maalu a bubanji ne nsombelu wa bweena ditunga adibo ba tshipeesha kudi Mulombodi wa ditunga, Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka anyi tshia batshipwita bakulumpa ne kudi Bukalenga bunene
Kadi netufuile ku mesu kuebe, netujimishe buloba buetu kabidi bualu kai

Bualu bua tubalu tua Palo ne makalu andi ne masalayi akadi enda ha nyima ha tubalu biakaya mu mai manene ne Yehowa wakahingasha mai ha mutu habo, kadi Bena Isalele bakenda ha buloba bûme munkatshi mua mai manene
Biasombesha muntu nansha nyama kai kudi mukuandi, ne biamutahabo mputa anyi biafueye ne muen andi kayiku, yeye nealamate bulelela
Numubikile, alue biandi kudia bidia
Yeye wakimita difu, wakalela muana wa balume, wakamuidika dina ne, Ele
Hakashika matuku muanda mutekete mai akavulangana ha buloba
Kadi yeye wakabambila ne, Nansha, nuakuluila anu bua kutangila ne buloba budi hatuhu
Kaleba ne Yoshua Badi Bashala ne Muoyo Aba mbantu bakabalabo kudi Mose ne kudi Eleazâ muakuidi, bakabala Bena Isalele mu mpata ya Moaba hehi ne Yadene mutangilangane ne Yeleko

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Mona, meme nakudiangatshila Bena Lewi munkatshi mua Bena Isalele mu miaba ya ban a bute bonso bakalelabo munkatshi mua Bena Isalele, Bena Lewi nebikale banyi: bualu bua ban a bute bonso mbanyi, mu dituku dinakashiha ban a bute bonso mu buloba bua Ejipitu, nakadijidila ban a bute bonso ba mu Isalele, ne ba bantu ne ba nyama, bobo mbanyi, meme ndi Yehowa
Biakuma ngombe mulume anyi mukashi ne nsengu yandi ne biafueye, nebakume ngombe mabue, kabadi munyinyi wandi nansha, kadi muena ngombe neabinge
Dituku dia dikumi ne atanu dia ngondo eu ndituku dinudi nudia bidia bia Yehowa, nenudie bidia bidi kabiyi ne luevene to matuku muanda mutekete

Bualu bua meme nengihate bisamba bia bantu ku mesu kuenu, nendeheshe matshika enu: bantu bakuabo kabena bikale ne lukuka lua buloba buenu, hanuamueneka kudi Yehowa Nzambi wenu misangu isatu ku tshidimu ku tshidimu
Mêyi ne mikandu adi afila mishindu ya kulondeshilula mapa aa
Yishemaele, muan andi mulume, wakadi ne bidimu dikumi ne bisatu hakamutengulabo
Kadi bialeleye muana wa bakashi, yeye neikale mundi udi kayi muakane tô mbingu ibidi, bu matuku a tshijila tshiandi, neikale ne mashi a kudilengesha kuandi tô matuku makumi asambombo ne asambombo
Nenudieku bidia ku mpala kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, nenusanke mu malu onso anudi nuenza ne bianza bienu, ne nuenu ne ba mu nsubu yenu mu malu onso akanusankisha n au Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Yehowa wakanuambila mei munkatshi mua kahia: nuenu nuakulua mei kadi kanuakatangila muntu; nuakunvua anu dî dia muntu
Miakulu mikwabo ya ditunga ke idi yenza bubanji bwa bunkanbwa bwa Kongu budi Mbulamatadi ne tshia kukuba

Bualu bua binuatumikila mikenji yonso Nakanuambila bua kuyenza bua kusua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne bua kuenda mu nshila yandi yonso, ne bua kulamata kudiye, hashishe Yehowa neanuihatshile bisamba ebi bionso ku mpala kuenu, nenuhiane buloba bua bisamba bidi binuhita bunene ne bukole
Bakamba kabidi ne, Bituikala ne luse ku mesu kuenu, nuitabushe bua buloba ebu buikale buhianyi bua bantu benu, kanuyi n etu dishiya dia Yadene
Palô wakamba ne, Nennulekele, nuye mu tshihela bua kushihela Yehowa Nzambi wenu nyama, kadi kanuyi kule, nundombele Nzambi
ndongamu miludiki ya ditunga dijima bwa kudiundisha bishimikidi bia nshindameenu bu mudi malobo, bipalu bia ndeka ne ngâla ya tuwulu;

Yeye wakamba ne, Bulelela, hakumbana ngondo, nempingane kûdi, ne mona, Sala, mukashi webe, neakulelele muana mulume Sala wakunvua dî diandi hakadiye mu ntenta ku mpenge kua tshibi, wakadi ku nyima kua muanjelo
Nzambi wakabanda kulu ku muaba wakadiye uyikila n andi
Ekesode Yetelo Udi Usomba ne Mose Yetelo, mubuki wa Midiyana, tatu muenu wa Mose, wakunvua malu onso akenzela Nzambi Mose ne Bena Isalele, bantu bandi, ne muakalua Yehowa ne Bena Isalele mu Ejipitu
Genese Nzambi Udi Wambila Abalahama bua Kufileye Isaka bu Mulambu Hakahita malu au Nzambi wakateta Abalahama, wakamuambila ne, Abalahama yeye wakitaba ne, Ndiku
Bakumuka mu Oboto, bakashikama mu Iye habalima, ku luseke lua Bena Moaba
Timena wakadi mue na mudimu wa bakashi wa Elifasa, muana wa Esau, ne yeye wakalelela Elifasa Amaleka, aba mbana ba balume ba Ada, mukashi wa Esau
Hakashikisha Yehowa kusomba ne Mose ha mukuna wa Sinai, yeye wakamuha mabue abidi akadi ne mikenji mifundahu ne munu wa Nzambi
Enza biebe mitshi ya acacia, lamika tshiamu tshia or ku nseke yai yonso

Kanana wakalela Sidona muaba buta wandi ne Hete ne Bena Yebuse ne Bena Amole ne Bena Gîgashi ne Bena Hiwi ne Bena Aka ne Bena Sina ne Bena Âwada ne Bena Semâ ne Bena Hamata Ku nyima kua malu au, Bena Kanana bakamuangalaka
, Babikila mukamba wà katamuka biebè
Palô wakabika mu butuku, yeye ne bantu bandi bonso, ne Bena Ejipitu bonso, muadi munene wakadi mu Ejipitu, kamuakadi nsubu wakadi kayi ne mufue
Aba mbantu bakabalabo mu meku a Bena Kohata bakadi benza mudimu mu ntenta wa kusambakena, bakababala kudi Mose ne Alona, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Nvula yakaloka ha buloba munya ne bufuku tô matuku makumi anai
Dutelonone Bunene bua Yehowa Nunku suai Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, numunemeke, nutumikile malu andi ne mei andi ne mikenji yandi matuku onso

Kadi biahangeye kumuhikula diambedi tshidimu tshimue katshiyi tshianze kuhita, nunku nsubu wa mu musoko udi munyungulula ne lumbu neikale kudi wakamusumba tô tshiendelele, muena nsubu kena uhingana mu nsubu halua tshidimu tshia disanka dinene
Bua Zebuluna yeye wakamba ne, Usanke mu kuluhuka kuebe; ne Yisakâ, usanke mu ntenta yebe
Kuinaminyi nzambi yabo, kuyitendeledi, kuenji mudibo benza, kadi ubiele hanshi, ushihe bibumba biabo
Monai argent ituakasangana mu bibombi bietu, tuakulua n ai kûdi kabidi hatuakafuma ku buloba bua Kanana
Onana wakamanya ne bana aba kabena bikala bu bana banyi ne hakayeye kudi mukashi wa mukulu andi, wakalela hanshi, bua yeye kaleledi mukulu andi bana
Bena Maki muana mulume wa Manashe bakaya ku Gilada, bakihata Bena Amole bakadimu bakanyenga musoko
Sheta wakalela muana mulume kabidi, wakamuidika dina ne, Enosha Etshi ntshibangidilu tshiakabikilabo dina dia Yehowa
Bakumukamu, bakaya ku Bê, ku mpokolo wa mai, wakambila Yehowa Mose ne, Usangisheku bantu, nembanuishe mai

Muanjelo wa Yehowa wakimana mu nshila mukese udi hankatshi ha madimi a tumuma, lumbu luakadi ku luseke elu, ne lumbu ku luseke lukuabo Mpunda wakatangila muanjelo wa Yehowa, wakadikuma ku lumbu, wakasunsula dikasa dia Belâma ku lumbu, ne yeye wakamukuma kabidi
Bweena ditunga dia Kongu budi mwa pashisha kudi muntu nkaya

Labana wakambila Yakoba ne, Bana aba bakashi mbana banyi, bana bakalelabo mbana banyi, ne bimuna mbianyi, ne bintu bionso biudi n abi mbianyi, ne lelu ndi mua kuenzela bana banyi ba bakashi ne bana bakalelabo tshinyi
Kanungu ka Mapa a bukola bwa mubidi ne a kubenga kupeta njiwu ma bia kudia badi baajadika

Yehowa Nzambi wakafuka nyama yonso ya mu madimi ne nyunyu yonso ya mulu ne buloba, wakalua n ai kudi mulume bua kutangila bu muakadiye mua kuyidika, dina dionso diakidikeye tshifukibue tshionso diakadi dina dia tshi
Bikala mulambu webe wa bukula budibo balamba mu dilonga, neusangishe bukula bubotesha ne manyi
Yeye wakamba ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa mukelenge wanyi Abalahama, ndi nkulomba ne, Ungendeshe dikasa dimpe lelu, ufuile mukelenge wanyi Abalahama luse

Bana balume ba Alona bakuidi nebateke kahia ha tshioshelu, balonge nkunyi mu kahia, ne bana balume ba Alona bakuidi nebalonge bituha ne mutu ne dianyi ha nkunyi mu kahia kadi ha tshioshelu, kadi nebuvuwe bintu bia munda ne bioku ne mai; ne muakuidi neoshile bintu bionso ha tshioshelu, bu mulambu udibo bosha ha kahia bu tshintu tshidi tshi tua dihembu kudi Yehowa
Bukalenga bunene budi bulombola tshidiidi tshia Ditunga
Kanungu ka Bishimikidi bia tshidiidi bia tshisabu bidi bishala too ne pateekabu bishimikidi bikwabo bidi bilongolola kudi Dîyi dikulu ne bikwata mudimu bu mudibio mu Dîyi dikulu dia Tshisabu
Yehowa wakahueka mu diulu, wakalua ha mutu ha mukuna wa Sinai

Kanungu ka Pa kumbusha tusumbu tukese twa matuku mala ne twa pa bwâtu, bibambalu biônso bibidi bidi mwa kushimika kamwe anyi tusumbu twa bûngi tudi tusambakaja bantu bûngi bwa momumwe nseka yônso bwa kutwangaja ngelelu wa meeji padiyo kayiyi ipetangana pa mwanda udi ukengela ne tuswika dîyi dimwe mu ngakwilu wa momumwe
Tuhita tua bantu ne tupitene tuakaya kudi bantu, tuakabambila ne, Palo wakamba ne, Tshiena nnuha bisonsa
Ebi mbintu bia kujidila n abi tshioshelu, hakelabo manyi ha mutu hatshi
Malu onso akalua bu muakambeye, bakampingasha mu mudimu wanyi, kadi bakowa muntu mukuabo
Kalongu kinâyi : Bidi bitangila Tshibutshilu tshia ditunga tshiabanyi tshia mpetu ne bintu
Balume aba bakumuka, bakaya mu nshila wa ku Sodoma, kadi Abalahama wakatshidi muimane ku mpala kua Yehowa
Dîyi didi dileeja mishindu ya makanyika a dikumbajija, a dilongolola pamwe ne njila ya mwa kualonda
Yosefe wakamona bana ba Efelayima to ne ku bikondo bisatu, bakalela bana ba Mala, muana wa Manashe, ha binu bia Yosefe kabidi
Lewitiki Eu udi mukenji wa mulambu wa disambuka dia mikenji, etshi ntshintu tshidi tshitambe tshijila
Kabeena mwa kupiisha muntu bwa bwaalu anyi bwa tshipwa mooyi tshidi tshikala tshibawu dîba divwatshio tshienzeka ne dîba dia dipiishibwa
Bena Kohata bakaya ku mpala batuale bintu bia mu nsubu wa tshijila, ne bakuabo bakashimika nsubu wa tshitendelelu diambedi bobo kabayi banze kulua
Nzambi Wakenza munda minene ibidi, muinda mutambe bunene bua kukokesha mu munya ne muinda mukese bua kukokesha butuku, yeye Wakenza mitoto kabidi
Bobo bakangata ku bianza bia Mose bintu bionso biakafua Bena Isalele ne disanka bua kuenza n abi bintu bionso bia mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu

Halua dituku dia muanda mute kete, muakuidi neatangile mu mputa, ne bikala mputa kayi mutampakane mu dikoba, ne kayi ubuela mu munyinyi wa mubidi, muakuidi neambile bantu ne, Muntu eu udi muakane, yeye neuvuwe bilulu biandi, neikale muakane
Dimueneka dia butumbi bua Yehowa diakadi bu kahia kakole ha mutu ha mukuna ku mesu kua Bena Isalele
Dutelonone Diulu, teleja matshu, nengambe, buloba bunvue mei a mukana muanyi
Wakateka bakashi benji ba mudimu ne bana babo ku mpala, ne Lea ne bana bandi ku nyima kuabo, ne Lakele ne Yosefe ku nyima kuabo

Ngabilayi kwakalwa maalu Adi ku batoka ne bafika Adi munda mwa bukwadisamba Atonda bantu munda mwa micima wabo Bààbà wanyì, Bààbà Bààbà wanyì twambilayi kwa kalwa maalu Bààbà wanyì twambilayi kwa kalwa maalu Bààbà wanyì twambilayi kwa kalwa maalu Mu Budimi bwa Edena Adama ne Eva bateka Bwà kutangila difunkibwa Nzambi wanyì e Umwayi mwa kalwa maalu : Bwà kudia kwenba Adama ne ututena Kulela kwaba Eva ne umona maalu Cilwàlwa bununu
Bualu ebu nebuikale bu tshimanyinu ku tshianza tshiebe ne bu tshivulukidi hankatshi ha mesu ebe, bua dî dia Yehowa dikale mukana muenu, bualu bua Yehowa wakanuhatula mu Ejipitu ne tshianza tshikole
Aba mbana ba Dishana: Usa ne Alana
Yai, muana mulume wa Manashe, wakangata luseke luonso lua Âgoba tô ne ku butshika bua Bena Geshû ne Bena Mâka, wakidika buloba bua Bashana bu dina diandi ne, Hawota yai tô ne ku dituku edi
Yeye wakakonka muhika ne, Eu mulume kai udi wendakana mu budimi bua kusambakana n etu
Edome neikale buhianyi, ne Sei, buloba bua bena lukuna bandi, neikale buhianyi buandi, kadi Bena Isalele nebenze malu makole
Bakumuka mu Pihahilota, bakahita munkatshi mua dishiba dia mai bakaya mu tshihela bakaya luendu lua matuku asatu mu tshihela tshia Etama, bakashikama mu Mala
Kadi Mose wakanyema ku mesu kua Palo, wakikala mu buloba bua Midiyana, wakashikama hehi ne dina dia mai
Nakukuenzela bualu bubi kai, bua wewe wakunvuisha ne bantu banyi mu bualu bubi bunene nunku

Pikalabio bienzeka mushindu wa momumwe luseka lukwabo, mwenyi yônso udi usanganyibwa mu njila mululame pa tshipaapu tshia ditunga udi ne tshia kusanka pende ne mapa ne budikadidi bwa momumwe ne bwa mweena Kongu, pa kumbusha mapa a tshidiidi
midimu ya mbulamatadi wa ditunga;

Kanungu ka Ditangilula dia dîyi nansha dimwe kadieena mwa kwenzeka tshikondo tshia Bukalenga bwa tshimpitshimpi anyi tshia Bukalenga bwa bilwilu, nansha tshikondu tshia bumfumu bwa ditunga bwa tshitupa tshiipi anyi padi Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka ne tshia batshipwita bakulumpa bipanga mwa kubweeja bisangilu mu budikadidi
Wakateka tshioshelu tshia or mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu ku mpala kua tshilulu, wakoshahu musenga wa manananshi, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
bukubi bwa ditunga pambelu;

Mose Udi Ubavuluisha Mikenji ya Isalele Â mmei akela Mose Bena Isalele: â mmalu ne â mmei ne ei mmikenji wakambila Mose Bena Isalele, hakaluhukabo mu Ejipitu, dishiya dia Yadene, mu tshibanda tshidi tshitangilangane ne Bete peô, mu buloba bua Sihona, mukelenge wa Bena Amole, wakadi ushikama mu Heshebona, wakashihabo kudi Mose ne Bena Isalele hakaluhukabo mu Ejipitu
Bu muakambila Yehowa Mose, wakababadila mu tshihela tshia Sinai
Wakenza mabaya asambombo a kuteka ku nyima ku luseke lua ku wesete
Kadi kuaka nenukebe Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, nenusangakene n andi hanuamukeba ne mitshima yenu yonso ne mioyo yenu yonso
Bakuidi bonso badi balue hehi ne Yehowa badijidile, bua Yehowa kabashihi
Bikala bantu bakane makumi atanu mu musoko, wewe neûshihe, kuena usungila musoko bualu bua bantu bakane makumi atanu badimu, anyi

Bintu bia mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu bidi bana balume ba Gêshona balama nebikale ntenta, ne tshilulu tshidibo bateka ha mutu, ne bilulu bia ku bibi bia ntenta wa kusambakena, ne bilulu bia luhangu ne bilulu bidibo bateka ku mbelu kua luhangu, hehi ne nsubu wa tshitendelelu, ne hehi ne tshioshelu, ne nshinga ya ku luhangu bua mudimu wa tshitendelelu
Nganyi wakukuna mitshi ya tumuma tukese kayi muanze kudia tumuma atu
Wenzeshe mabue â kudi muntu udi ne lungenyi lule lua kufunda mateta bimpe, yeye neafundehu mena a Bena Isalele, babueshe mabue mu masoso a mu bintu bia or
Hakakola dî dia mpungi bikole bikole, Mose wakela dî ne Nzambi wakitaba kudiye ne dî diandi
Ku nyima kua lufu lua Abalahama Nzambi wakasankisha Isaka muan andi, ne Isaka wakashikama mu Be laha loi

Biafuilanganabo bua tshintu tshionso, nansha ngombe nansha mpunda nansha mukoko nansha bilulu nansha bintu bikuabo bidi bantu bamba ne, Ebu mbualu bua bantu baye kudi balumbuluishi, muntu udi balumbuluishi bahishe yeye neafute mukuandi bintu misangu ibidi

Nzambi wakamba ne, Mai avudishe bifukibua bia bungi bidi ne muoyo, ne nyunyu myunge mulu Nzambi wakafuka bintu binene bia mu mai ne bintu bionso bidi ne muoyo bia mu mai bu mudi mishindu yabi, ne nyunyu yonso bu mudi mushindu wai Nzambi wakabimona ne, Mbimpe Nzambi wakabisankisha ne, Nulelangane, nulue bia bungi, nûshe mai manene tente, nyunyu ikumbane ha buloba Dilolo ne dinda biakadi dituku ditanu

Yehowa wakatuhatula mu Ejipitu ne tshianza tshikole ne diboko diandi diolola ne malu makole ne bimanyinu ne malu a dikema; wakalua n etu mu muaba eu, wakatuha buloba ebu, buloba budi bûle tente ne mabele ne buitshi
Kanubandi ku tshioshelu tshianyi ha tshibanda, bantu kabatangidi butaka buebe
Halua Yehowa n enu mu buloba bua Bena Kanâna buakanulayeye ne batatu enu ne hanuheye buloba abu, nuenu nenujidile Yehowa ban a bute bonso ba bantu ne ba nyama kabidi, bana ba balume mbana ba Yehowa
Udi wangata mapangadika mu mukanda wa olodonase
ndongamu wa polovensa
Mose ne Alona bakasangisha bantu bonso ku mpala kua dibue, ne yeye wakabambila ne, Unvuai, bena kutomboka, netunuhatuile mai ku dibue edi, anyi

Kabeena mwa kunyingalaja muntu nansha umwe mu mudimu wende bwa pa kutangila kudiye ufumina, bwa bulume anyi bwa bukaji bwende, bwa ngelelu yende ya meji, bwa ditabuuja diende ne bwa makookeshi ende a mu nsombelu mu musoko ne mu bubanji Mweena Kongu yônso udi ne bukookeshi ne dikanyika dia kusakidila mudimu wende ku diibaka ne ditantshisha dia ditunga
Bumfumu bwa kabukulu budi ne dikanyika dia kukolesha bumwe ne dikongangana dia ditunga
Dituku edi nedikale kunudi bu tshmilukidi, nenudilame bu disanka dia Yehowa, nuenu nenuvuluke dituku edi ne tshivulukidi etshi tshiendelele

Nomba Kulengesha kua Badi Kabayi Bakane Yehowa wakambila Mose ne Alona ne, Eu udi mukenji wakuela Yehowa ne, Nuambile Bena Isalele bua bobo balue kûdi ne muana wa ngombe mukunze, udi kayi ne ditoba anyi tshilema, udi kayi muanze kuya muinshi mua mutshi wa tshikokedi

Muakuidi nêle manyi munda mua tshianza tshiandi tshia bakashi, muakuidi neamiamine ne munu wandi wa ku tshianza tshia balume manyi adi mu tshianza tshiandi tshia bakashi misangu muanda mutekete ku mpala kua Yehowa, muakuidi nealabe manyi adi mu tshianza tshiandi tshia bakashi ku lusongo lua ditshu dia ku tshianza tshia balume dia muntu udiye musue kulengesha ne ku tshiala tshiandi tshia ku tshianza tshia balume ne ku muan a dikasa munene wa ku tshia nza tshia balume, ha mutu ha mashi a mulambu wa disambuka dia mikenji, manyi adi ashala mu tshianza tshia muakuidi, yeye neaele ha mutu ha muntu udiye musue kulengesha, bua kumubuikidila disambuka diandi ku mpala kua Yehowa
Yeye wakamba ne, Kanana udi muedibue mulau, yeye neikale muhika wa bahika kudi bana babo
Wakakudika tshilulu ku mbelu kua nsubu
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Hawahingana mu Ejipitu, wenza ku mesu kua Palô malu a kukema onso anakuteka mu tshianza tshiebe, kadi meme nenkoleshe mutshima wa Palô, ne yeye kena ulekela bantu

Bungi bua matuku atuakalala mu nshila ku Kadeshe bânea tô ne ku kasulu ka Zelede akadi bidimu makumi asatu ne muanda mukulu; tô ne hakafua mulongo wonso wa bena nvita munkatshi mua tshitudilu, bu muakabalaya Yehowa
Wakenza mahu asambombo, mahu asatu ku luseke lumue lua tshitekelu ne mahu asatu ku luseke lukuabo
Gamaliele, muana mulume wa Pedasû, mukelenge wa bana ba Manashe, wakafua bintu dituku dia muanda mukulu
Yehowa wakakengesha bantu bualu bua bobo bakenza kana ka ngombe kakadi Alona muenze

Milambu yabi ya bintu bidibo banua neyikale tshituha tshia dikoho dia nvinyo ku muana wa ngombe yonso, ne tshintu tshisatu tshia dikoho dia nvinyo ku tshimpanga tshionso, ne tshintu tshinai tshia dikoho dia nvinyo ku muana wa mukoko yonso, eu udi mulambu unudi nuosha ha kahia ku ngondo ku ngondo tô ne ngondo yonso ya mu tshidimu, Nenufile mulume wa mbushi bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi kudi Yehowa ku mutu kua milambu idibo bafila buatshia buatshia ne milambu ya bintu bidibo banua
Bena Isalele bakadisangisha kudi Bâla peô ne tshiji tshiakakuata Yehowa bualu bua Bena Isalele
Muprofete udi udiambila mei mu dina dianyi ne dikamakama andi tshiyi mumuambile anyi udi wamba mei mu dina dia nzambi mukuabo, muprofete au neafue biandi

Yehowa neahite bua kushiha Bena Ejipitu, hamoneye mashi ku mutshi wa ha mushiku wa mbelu ne ku biluwa bia mushiku wa nsubu, neaye biandi ha mutu ha tshibi, neahite, Yehowa neahidishe mushiku ne, Kayi mu nsubu yenu bua kunushiha
Ekesode Mulau Udi Ukuata Bimuna Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Ya biebe kudi Palô, umuambile ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa Bena Ebelu, udi Wamba ne, Ulekele bantu banyi, baye kuntendelela
Mukashi wakamukudimuna ne, Umpe kakanu ka ku munu webe ne mionshi misuika ku maboko ebe ne tshibangu tshiebe tshiudi n atshi mu tshianza tshiebe

Bungi bua bantu benu badi bashala nebikale ne mitshima mitekete mu buloba bua bantu badi n abo lukuna, nebanyeme hunvuabo tshiona tshia dibeshi dia mutshi didi dinyunga kudi luhehele, nebanyeme bu mundi udi unyema ku muele wa nvita, nebadishinde, mundi kayi ubihata
Wakenzelaku Yehowa tshioshelu, Wakabikila dina dia Yehowa

Bamfumu ba mbulamatadi badi bumvwangana ne bisumbu bidi biambulwisha ditanta dia bantu mu bitupa bia nsombelu mu ditunga, bubanji, lungenyi, nsombelu wa mulowo ne nyuma, ne kabidi ne bisumbu bidi bilongesha beena mwabo balume ne bakaji maalu
Ekesode Dibikidibua dia Mose Mose wakadi ulama mikoko ya Yetelo tatu andi muenu, mubuki wa mu Midiyana, wakaya ne mikoko ku nyima kua tshihela, wakalua ku mukuna wa Nzambi, dina diau Holeba

Kadi mu bualu ebu buonso kanuakatumikila Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakaya ku mpala kuenu mu nshila bua kunukebela muaba wa kushimika ntenta yenu, mu difutu dikenka kahia butuku, ne mu dî tulu dia diledi munya, bua kunulombola mu nshila unuakadi ne bualu bua kuenda
Hakabamona Yakoba, yeye wakamba ne, Ebi mbisumbu bia banjelo ba Nzambi, Wakabikila muaba au ne, Mahanayima

Tubadi ne tubinadi, twa beena mwaabo ne twa basalayi, tudi tulonda ndondu ya pankatshi pa matunga idi ditunga ditaba mu njila mululame, mêyi, mapangadika maludiki, padiwo kâyi abengangana ne mêyi ne mikandu ne kabukulu kadi kafila bulongama bwa bantu bônso ne bibidilu bia mulowu
Bana bandi bakadi ne mukalu wabo ku Hawila to ne ku Shû, ku mpala kua Ejipitu mu nshila wa ku Ashû, bakashikama batangilangane ne bana babo bonso
Kanungu ka Kakuyi dinyangakaja dia bulongolodi bukwabo bwa Dîyi dikulu ditudi nadi edi, mianda idi ilonda eyi idi ipona mu bukookeshi bupalakana bwa bukalenga bunene ne polovensa:

Kukuna mutshima webe ku nsubu wa mukuenu, kukumi mutshima webe ku mukashi wa mukuenu anyi ku muntu wandi mulume anyi ku muntu wandi mukashi anyi ku ngombe wandi anyi ku mpunda wandi anyi ku tshintu tshionso tshia mukuenu

Mose wakamanyisha Bena Isalele, bakelenge babo bakamuha milangala dikumi ne ibidi, mukelenge mulangala wandi mukelenge mulangala wandi, bu mu nsubu ya batatu abo, ne mulangala wa Alona wakadi munkatshi mua milangala yabo
Kanungu ka Budikadidi bwa kwenza bisangilu kabiyi ndululu ne bia lufu budi bwanyishibwe kadi anu mu dineemeka dia mêyi ne mikandu, dia bulongama bwa bantu bônso ne dia bibidilu bia mulowo

Nuenu nutumikile mei andi ne mikenji yandi, bu munakunuambila lelu, bua nuenu nuikale ne disanka ne bana benu badi banulonda ku nyima, ne bua nuenu nuvudishangane matuku enu ha buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha tshiendelele
Hakila butuku yeye wakangata Lea, muan andi wa bakashi, wakamufila kudiye, ne yeye wakabuela n andi mu nsubu
Bakambilangana ne, Monai, muena bilota njowa ulua
Alona wakabaka Elisheba, muana wa bakashi wa Aminadaba, muan abo wa bakashi ne Nashona ne yeye wakamulelela Nadaba ne Abihu, Eleazâ ne Itamâ
Palô wakabikila Mose, wakamuambila ne, Yai bienu nutendelele Yehowa, shiyai anu mikoko ne ngombe, bana benu bakese baye n enu
Mulume udi wenda masandi ne mukashi wa mulume mukuabo, nebashihe mulume ne mukashi wake ndeye n andi masandi
Bena Amaleka badi ku luseke lua ku Sude, Bena Hiti ne Bena Yebuse ne Bena Amole badi ku luseke lua ku mikuna, Bena Kanâna badi hehi ne mai manene ne kukala kua musulu wa Yadene
Miakulu yaadi ya mu ditunga idi tshikongo, dingala, tshisawudi ne tshiluba
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Enza biebe nyoka ne mubidi bu kahia, umuteke kulu kua mutshi, nunku hamutangila mundi musumibue, neikale ne muoyo
Buloba Nebuabanyibue ku Nshobo Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Newabanyine bantu aba buloba bua buhianyi buabo bu bungi bua mena abo
Nzambi wakabiteka mulu mua diulu bua kutokeshayi buloba, ne bua kukokeshayi mu munya ne butuku, ne bua kutahululayi munya kudi midima, Nzambi wakabimona ne, Mbimpe

Kadi tatu wandi wakabenga ne, Ndi mumanye bualu ebu, muan anyi, yeye nealue bantu ba bungi, nealue muntu munene kabidi, kadî muakuny andi neamutambe bunene, ne tunkanunuina tuandi netuikale tshisamba tshinene
Bu muakadi Yehowa ne disanka bua kunuenzela bimpe ne bua kunukumbasha ba bungi, mbu mudiye mua kuikala ne disanka bua kunujimisha ne bua kunushiha; nebanûmushe mu buloba bunudi nuya bua kubuhiana
Aba mbana balume ba Hama ku meku abo ne ku nuaku yabo ne ku maloba abo ne ku bisamba biabo
Wewe neubale bungi bua bintu kudi mundi mulume udi ne bidimu makumi abidi tô ne ku bi dimu makumi asambombo bu nshekele ya argent makumi atanu bu nshekele udibo bafila mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu
Muhika wakaya lubilu kudiye, wakamuakidila, wakamuambila ne, Ndi nkutendekena ne, Umpeku tuima tukese bia meme kunua
Badi baleeja mpala musangu mwibîdi amu kudi bantu babidi badi bapeta mêyi mapita bungi musangu wa kumpala
Lewitiki Kabendi Masandi Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Au mmeku a Bena Zebuluna, bungi buabo buakabalabo buakadi binunu makumi asambombo ne nkama itanu

Mose wakabikila Yoshua, wakamuambila ku mesu kua Bena Isalele bonso ne, Wikale ne bukole ne mutshima wa dikima, bualu bua wewe uyaya ne bantu aba mu buloba buakalaya Yehowa batatu babo bua kubahabu; ne wewe neubahianyishe buloba abu
Nuenu nudi ne bualu bua kujimisha miaba yonso yakadi bisamba binudi nuihata bitendelelaku nzambi yabo ku mutu kua mikuna mile, ne ku mutu kua tukuna tukese ne muinshi mua mitshi mibishi
: Bidi bitangila mapa a bweena mwaabo ne a tshidiidi
Udi ulesha buakane kudi bana ba nshiya ne bakashi ba mu lufuila, udi musue kuha benyi bintu bia kudia ne bintu bia kuluata
Bileha wakimita difu, wakalelela Yakoba muana wa balume

Kanuntendeledi ne mashi a nyama mishiha ne bidia bidi ne luevene hohamue kanushiyi manyi a nyama ya milambu yanyi to ne ku dinda Bintu bia kumudilu binudi nu huola mu madimi, nulue n abi mu nsubu wa Yehowa, Nzambi wenu

Bikaleye kayi ne mushinga wa muana wa mukoko, yeye neafile mulambu wa disambuka dia mikenji kudi Yehowa, nansha nyunyu ya nkutshi ibidi nansha mputu nyunyu ibidi, nyunyu umue bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi ne mukuabo bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia
Badi mwa kutentemuna mpwila mambu mu mwaba mukwabo wa ditunga anu pikalabo bebeja dianyisha dia beena ditunga bônso

bilongelu bikulu ne bilongelu bikwabo bia mianda ya mamanya, mamanya mapiluke anyi a midimu bidibu bâsa anyi bambulwisha kudi Bukalenge bunene anyi kudi makalenga a polovensa ne bidi mêyi a ditunga mâmba ne bidi ne diambulwisha bwa ditunga dijima;
Wakamona kabidi ngombe mikuabo muanda mutekete minyane, kayakadi ne manyi nansha, yakabanda mu mai, yakimana ne ngombe mikuabo kukala kua mai
Bakateka bintu bia kudia ha nyima ha mpunda yabo bakaya
Mu Holeba nuakafuisha Yehowa tshiji kabidi ne Yehowa wakadi n enu tshiji, wakamba kunushiha

Mulambu wandi wakadi dilonga disalame dia tshiamu tshia argent, bujitu buadi buakadi nshekele lukama ne makumi asatu, ne dilonga dia ndondo dia argent wa nshekele makumi muanda mutekete bu nshekele wa mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, bubidi buabi biule tente ne bukula bubotesha busangisha ne manyi bu mulambu wa bukula, ne nkutu wa or wa nshekele dikumi mûle tente ne musenga wa manananshi, ne muana mulume wa ngombe ne tshimpanga tshimue ne muana mulume wa mukoko wa tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia, mbushi wa mpumbu bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi, ne ngombe ibidi ne bimpanga bitanu ne mbushi ya mpumbu itanu ne bana balume ba mikoko batanu ba tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala eu udi mulambu wa Elisû, muana mulume wa Shedeu
Yeye neafile mulambu wandi wa mikata ya bukula budi ne luevene ne mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala bua kusakidileye n ai Nzambi
Anyi bikaleye mumukume ne mutshi mu tshianza, ne biafileye, yeye udi mushihi wa muntu, nebashihe mushihi wa muntu
Bantu ba mu tshisamba tshia Shimeona nebashikame hehi n andi Shelumiele muana mulume wa Sulishadai neikale mukelenge wa bana ba Shimeona
Bukalenga bunene budi butangila buludiki bwa midimu ya mbulamatadi, Bilwilu, bampulushi ne midimu ya bukubi
Pikalabo bakeepesha dinyooka bilondeshila mêyi ne mikandu mieela panyima pa dikosa dia tshilumbu, badi bafila dinyooka anu mudi mêyi ne mikandu mipiamipia midifunda

Kanungu ka Padiku dibenga kumvwangana dia munanunanu pankatshi pa Bukalenga bunene ne Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwaka, Mfumu wa Ditunga udi, panyima pa diyukilangana ne minisitila kavulambedi ne Balombodi ba Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka ne tshia batshipwita bakulumpa, mwa kumungutula Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita
Kanungu ka Mukulakaja ne mulema badi ne tshia kubakuba mu mushindu wa sungansunga pa kutangila majinga abo a mubidi, a lungenyi ne a bibidilu bia mulowu
Dituku dia matuku dikumi ne atanu a ngondo eu mene ndituku dia kudila Yehowa bidia bidi kabiyi ne luevene, nenudie bidia bidi kabiyi ne Iuevene matuku muanda mutekete
Yeye wakimana ha buihi n abo muinshi mua mutshi hakadibo badia
Kanungu ka Mbênza tshisangilu tshia ba Nguvenêla ba polovensa
Bantu ba lungenyi lule bakadi benza midimu ya mishindu yonso mu tshitendelelu bakaha kudi Mose, bakamuambila ne, Bantu badi balue ne bintu bitamba bungi bia kuenza n abi mudimu wakuamba Yehowa

Kanungu ka Muntu nansha umwe kêna mwa kufila mpala mu batshipwita bakulumpa padiye kêna ukumbaja makanyika adi alonda aa: kwikala mweena Kongu; kwikala ne mvula ya tshileledi kayiyi mishadila ku ; kwikala ne bujima bwa makookeshi a bweena mwabo ne a tshidiidi; kubeenga kubwelakana mu maalu adibo babenga kudi dîyi dia masungulangana
Isaka wakamuambila ne, Nakatshina ne, Nebanshihe bua bualu buandi
Wa mu tshisamba tshia Dana, Ahiezê muana mulume wa Amishadai

Nunku bungi bua Bena Isalele buakabalabo ku nsubu ya batatu abo, ku bidimu makumi abidi tô ne ha mutu, bonso bakamanya mua kuya mu nvita mu Isalele bungi bua buonso buabo buakabalabo buakadi binunu nkama isambombo ne bisatu ne nkama itanu ne makumi atanu
Nomba Milambu ya Buatshia buatshia Ek
Ya biebe, ubambile ne, Hinganai bienu ku ntenta yenu
Muntu yonso udi ulala ne nyama udi ne mulau
Wewe neusaye tshimpanga, uvuwa mala atshi ne mikolo, uteke bituha biatshi hamue ne mutu watshi
Au mmeku a Lewi: diku dia Bena Libina, diku dia Bena Hebelone ne diku dia Mali ne diku dia Bena Mushi ne diku dia Bena Kola Kohata wakalela Amalama
Bantu bakakonka Lota ne, Bantu bakuabo badi n ebe anyi
Kadi yeye wakowa kahita ka bena bidia bu muakamba Yosefe
Hakamutangila Yuda, yeye wa kelangana meji ne, Yeye udi mukashi wa masandi, bualu bua yeye wakabuikila mpala wandi ne tshilulu
munda bu udi Bulongolodi budibo bamona ne kabweena bumvwangana ne Dîyi dikulu kabeena mwa kubukumbaja to
Asenata, muana mukashi wa Poti fela, mubuki wa mu Ono, wakalelela Yosefe bana ba balume babidi, diambedi tshiole katshiyi tshianze kulua
Kadi ngombe ne tshiseba tshiandi ne munyinyi wandi ne tunvi tuandi yeye wakabioshila ku butshika bua tshitudilu, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Badi basungula tshipwita mukulumpa yônso ne bantu babidi badi mwa kumupingana

Yakoba Udi Unyema Esau Esau wakadi ne Yakoba lukuna bualu bua disanka diakamusankisha n adi tatu andi Esau wakamba mu mutshima wandi ne, Hashika matuku a madilu a tatu anyi, hashishe, nenshihe muakuny anyi Yakoba
Yakoba wakangata dibue, wakadimanyika bu tshibumba
Nenuikale ne milau mu kukumbasha kua bana ne mu bintu bidi bidiunda mu buloba ne mu kukumbasha kua bimuna ne kua mikoko
Ngombe muanda mutekete mikuabo, minyane, kayakadi ne manyi yakayilonda, tshakatangila ngombe minyane nunku mu buloba bua Ejipitu diambedi nansha
Utuhe bietu buhianyi munkatshi mua bana babo ne tatu wetu
Mfumu wa kabukulu yônso udi ujinga kwenza mudimu, udi ukengela kufila mpala, udi ne tshia kudifila ku masungulangana, pa kumbusha dilonda dia bulongolodi bwa kanungu ka , kalongu bwa Dîyi dikulu edi
Bakadi basangisha bisumbu bia mikoko bionso kunoko, bakumusha dibue diakadi ku mushiku wa dina, bakanuisha mikoko mai, bakahingasha dibue dia ku mushiku wa ku muaba wadi
Nuenu nuakadibisha mu miaba ya batatu benu bu bana ba bantu babi bakavulangana, bua kudiundisha bukole bua tshiji tshia Yehowa kudi Isalele
Yehowa wakangambilaku tshikondo atshi bua meme nnumanyishe mei ne mikenji, bua nuenu kubienza mu buloba bunudi nubuela bua kubuhiana
Yehowa wakamba ne, Nensokoke Abalahama bualu bundi ngenza, anyi
Nennuangate bu bantu banyi ne meme nengikale Nzambi wenu, nuenu nenumanye ne, Meme udi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi unuhatula muinshi mua majitu a Bena Ejipitu
Ekesode Nzambi Udi Ubaka Mona Bakabika mu Elima ne Bena Isalele bonso, bakalua mu tshihela, dina diatshi Sina, hankatshi ha Elima ne Sinai
Bika biebe, ubishe nsongalume, umukuate ku tshianza, bualu bua meme nemmuvuishe tshisamba tshinene
dibandila dia ditunga ne dia bintu;
Bakatula tshiamu tshia or to ku muhimbu mukese, bakenza nshinga ya or, bakatshikuma ne buanda bua bleu ne bukunzubile ne bukunze kunzu ne bua lin kudi bantu ba lungenyi lule
Muntu eu wakalua n abo mu nsubu wa Yosefe, wakabaha mai, ne bobo bakuvuwa makasa abo, ne yeye wakadisha mpunda yabo kabidi

Mose wakambila Alona ne bana bandi balume ne, Nulambe munyinyi mu mai a kahia ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusangakena, nûdie ne mampa adi mu tshisaka tshidi ne bintu bia tshijila bu munakamba ne, Alona ne bana bandi balume nebaudie
Muanjelo wa Yehowa wakamuambila ne, Nenkumbashile tunkanunuina biebe, tuikale bia bungi, kabena mua kutubala bua bungi bualu

Hashishe newambile muan ebe mulume ne, Tuakadi bahika ba Palo mu Ejipitu, ne Yehowa wakatuhatula mu Ejipitu ne tshianza tshikole; ne Yehowa wakatulesha bimanyinu ne malu a kukema a bungi ne makole mu Ejipitu ne kudi Palô ne ba mu nsubu muandi, ku mesu kuetu; yeye wakatuhatulamu, bualu bua kulua n etu ne bua kutuha buloba buakalayeye batatu betu

Bikala muntu mukusuke tshituha tshibi hehi n andi, ne bikala mutu wa tshijila tshiandi muonyibue, nunku yeye neabeye nsuki ya ha mutu n andi mu dituku didiye mudilengeshe, neadibeye nsuki dituku dia muanda mutekete
Ekesode Mulau wa Mikumbi Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Ya biebe kudi Palô, bualu bua nakakolesha mutshima wandi ne mitshima ya bantu bandi bua kulesha bimanyinu bianyi munkatshi muabo
Nunku nudi ne bualu bua kutumikila dî dia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne bua kuenza mikenji yandi ne mei andi bindi nnuambila lelu
Bantu bebe bonso nebalue kundi, nebankukuile, nebambe ne, Ya biebe ne bantu bonso badi balonda ku nyima kuebe, ne ku nyima kua bualu ebu nempatuke

Kanungu ka Panyima pa dishintakaja dia ngenyi mu Tshipangu tshia baminisitila, Minisitila kavulambedi udi mwa kushindika, kumpala kwa Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka, bukookeshi bwa Bukalenga bunene pa ndongamu wende, pa diteeja dia tshidiidi tshijima anyi pa disungula dia mukanda
Mpunda wakatangila muanjelo wa Yehowa muimane mu nshila, ne muele wa nvita mu tshianza tshiandi, mpunda wakasesuka mu nshila, wakaya mu budimi, Belâma wakakuma mpunda bua kumuhingisha mu nshila
Bantu bandi bakamubadilabo bakadi binunu makumi atanu ne binai ne nkama mai
Hashishe hanuabuela mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu unuha, nenjadike disanka ku mukuna wa Gelizima, ne mulau ku mukuna wa Ebala
Mose wakaluhuka, wakambila bantu mei a Yehowa, wakasangisha balume makumi muanda mutekete ba bakulu ba bantu, wakabanyungulusha Ntenta
Bintu bionso bidi bidikoka hanshi ha buloba bidi bibi, kanudi bintu ebi

Nebateke dibendele dia tshitudilu tshia Efelayima ku luseke lua ku wesete ku bisumbu biabo Elishama muana mulume wa Amihuda neikale mukelenge wa bana ba Efelayima Bantu bandi bakamubadilabo bakadi binunu makumi anai ne nkama itanu
Eu newikale mukenji kunudi tshiendelele bua kubuikila bubi bua Bena Isalele musangu umue ku tshidimu ku tshidimu
Biafila muntu argent anyi biuma mu bianza bia mukuandi bua kubilama, ne biabibabo mu nsubu muandi, biasanganabo muibi, yeye neabafute bintu misangu ibidi
Tshisumbu tshia tshidiidi Tshisumbu tshia luponda lumwe Dikalaku difila kudi mêyi a Mbulamatadi Ndongamu, dilondeshisha dia maalu anyi midimu

Biwahidia kulekela bantu hanyi, makelela nentumine mikumbi mu buloba buebe, neyikale ha mutu ha buloba buonso, kabena mua kutangila buloba, yoyo neyidie bintu biakushala ku mabue a nvula, nenudie mitshi yenu yonso idi idiunda mu budimi

Mu dituku dia muanda mutekete Nzambi wakadi mumane kushikisha mudimu wandi wakenzeye, yeye wakikisha dituku dia muanda mutekete ku mudimu wonso wakenzeye Nzambi wakavudishila dituku dia muanda mutekete disanka, wakadijidila, bualu bua yeye wakikisha dituku diadia ku mudimu wandi wonso wa kufuka ne kuenza
Yai bienu, nudikebele bisonsa kunudi mua kubisangana, kadi kabena bahuekesha mudimu wenu
Mpala ya badi bakeba mwa kubasungulabo mu Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga badi bayifila kudi bisumbu bia tshidiidi anyi kudi nsangilu wa bisumbu bia tshidiidi

Yeye neikale n ebe bu muena mudimu anyi bu muenyi, neakukuatshile mudimu tô ne halua tshidimu tshia disanka dinene, hashishe yeye neumuke kudi ne yeye ne bana bandi badi n andi, nebahingane kudi bana babo ne ku buhianyi bua batatu bandi
Muaba wakadi mukese bua bobo kushikama hohamue, bualu bua bintu biabo biakadi bia bungi, kabakamanya mua kushikama hohamue
Nunku bantu bakikisha dituku dia muanda mutekete
Pikalaku lufu, tshipumbishi anyi didilekeela dia umwe wa ku bantu babidi aba, badi babalonda badi baleeja mpala bilondeshila dilondangana diaabu mu musangu wa kumpala
Yehowa neanuihatshile bena lukuna badi bahika ku mesu kuenu; nebalue kunudi mu nshila umue, nebanyeme ku mesu kuenu mu nshila muanda mutekete

Ka nudiangatshidi tshintu tshimue tshia mulau tshia musoko au mu tshianza tshienu; nunku Yehowa nealekele tshiji tshiandi tshikole, neanuleshe luse, neanusankishe, neanukumbashe bu muakalayeye batatu benu; hanunvua dî dia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua kutumikila mikenji yandi yonso inakunuambila lelu ne bua kuenza malu adi makane ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Muntu yonso udi utuala mubidi mufue wa nyama ei, neuvuwe bilulu biandi, neikale ne bu koya tô ne dilolo, nyama ei idi mibi kunudi
Binuenda mu nshila mdi muhidie, kanuyi nunvua mei anyi, meme nendiundishe makenga enu mahite mibi yenu misangu muanda mutekete
Nulonde anu dilumbuluisha didi diakane, nunku nenuikale ne muoyo, nenuhiane buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha
Yehowa neanutumine disama dia nfuenke ne dia mubidi kahia ne dia biusha ne dia lukanku, ne miele ya nvita, ne luhehele lua nvunde ne butu; malu au neanulonde tô ne hanuafua
Nudi nuteta Yehowa munyi
Bantu bonso nebakudimune dî ne, Amen
Muntu udi ushiha mukuabo nebamushihe
Balume bonso ba mu nsubu wandi, baledibue mu nsubu wandi, ne basumbibue ku argent kudi ba bende, bakatengudibua n andi

Nomba Kubala kua Bungi bua Bantu ku Moaba Hashishe hakashika disama, Yehowa wakambila Mose ne Eleazâ, muana mulume wa Alona muakuidi ne, Nubale bungi bua bantu ba mu tshisumbu tshia Bena Isalele, ba mu bidimu makumi abidi tô ne ha mutu, ku nsubu ya batatu abo, badi bamanye mua kuya mu nvita ya Bena Isalele

Hanuahanga, kanuyi nutumikila mikenji yonso yakambila Yehowa Mose, malu onso mene akanuambila Yehowa mukana mua Mose ku dituku diakanuheye mikenji yandi tô ne ku bikondo bionso bidi ku mpala, bikala bualu buenjibue ku mpukahuka, bantu ba tshisumbu kabayi babumanye, bantu bonso nebafile muana mulume wa ngombe bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia bua kutuisha dihembu dimpe kudi Yehowa, ne mulambu wandi wa bukula ne mulambu wandi wa bintu bidibo banua, ne muana mulume wa mbushi bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi, bu mudi mukenji wamba
Mulume eu wakamutangila talalâ, wakadi welangana meji munda bua kumanyeye ne, Yehowa wakungendesha dikasa bimpe, anyi
Halua tshidimu tshitanu, nudi mua kudia mamuma ne kuendulula n au mushinga meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Angata mutanda wa mampa, ne mukala mulamba ne manyi, ne kakata kahehele bia mu tshisaka tshia bidia bidi kabiyi ne luevene bidi ku mpala kua Yehowa
Mukulu andi, muana wa bakashi, wakambila muana wa bakashi wa Palô ne, Nye kukubikidila muamushi wa muana wa mu bakashi ba Bena Ebelu, alue kukuamushila muana mabele, anyi
Hakatangila Lea ne, Tshiena ndela bana kabidi, yeye wakangata Zilepa, muena mudimu wandi wa bakashi, wakamufila kudi Yakoba bu mukashi wandi
Bobo nebadie, muntu tshituha tshiandi muntu tshituha tshiandi ku mutu kua buhianyi bua batatu abo buakahanabo
Nyuma kudibo, bakamba dî dia Nzambi, kadi kabakenza kabidi musangu mukuabo
Kuikadi ne nzambi mikuabo ne meme hohamue
Nenjadike n enu tshihungidi tshianyi ne, Tshiena njimisha bintu bionso ne mai kabidi nansha, mai kaena awilangana kabidi bua kujimishau buloba
Yehowa udi bukole buanyi ne musambu wanyi, yeye wakulua luhandu luanyi, Yeye udi Nzambi wanyi, nemmutumbishe, udi Nzambi wa tatu anyi, nemmunemeke
Bobo nebatumikile dî dianyi, bua biahidiabo, nebadituadile bubi buabo, nebafue meme ndi Yehowa wakabajidila
Bakelenge bakafua bintu bia kujidila n abi tshioshelu mu dituku diakelabo manyi ha mutu hatshi, mbakelenge mene bakafua bintu biabo ku mpala kua tshioshelu

Kanulumbuluishi bantu ne dilumbuluisha didi kadiyi diakane; kanutangidi mpala ya bantu; kanuitabushi bintu bia kunubueshilabo n abi; bualu bua bintu bia kunubueshilabo n abi bidi bifofomesha mesu a muena lungenyi, bidi binyanga dilumbuluisha didi diakane
Kanungu ka Mêyi malongolodi adi aleeja bulongolodi ne lwendu lwa midimu ya mbulamatadi ya bukalenga bunene, ya polovensa ne ya bitupa bia teletwale bidiludika
Nenudie mulambu dituku dinudi nûfila ne makelela kabidi, biashala tshintu tô ne dituku disatu nebatshioshe mu kahia
Yehowa wakamona ne, Mibi ya bantu idi idiundadiunda munkatshi mua ba ha buloba ne meji adibo bela mu mitshima yabo adi mabi matuku onso
Kadi kuditshiha kua mukashi wa mu lufuila, anyi mukashi udi muhidia kudi mulume wandi, mei andi onso akaditshiheye n au neajalame
Wakaya biandi dituku dibidi, wakamona balume babidi ba Bena Ebelu baluangana, yeye wakakonka muntu
Biafua nyama wa munkatshi mua nyama mudi mua kudia, mundi yonso udi ulenga tshianza tshiandi ham bidi handi neikale ne bukoya tô ne dilolo
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Muntu yonso wakungenzela bibi, nemmujimishe yeye mu mukanda wanyi
Muntu yonso udi utentulula mukalu wa muena mutumba n andi udi ne mulau
Balami ba mikoko bakalua, bakabihata, kadi Mose wakabika, wakabasankisha, wakanuisha mikoko yabo mai
Hakafikabo ku nsubu wa tshilala benyi, umue wabo wakasulula tshi bombi tshiandi bua kudisheye mpunda wandi, wakatangila argent yandi ba mutu ha tshibombi tshiandi

Mose Udi Ubadimusha bua Mpingu Hashiha Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bisamba bidi ku mpala kuenu, hanuabihata, hanuahiana buloba buabo, nudimuke, kanukuatshibu kudi mateyi abo bua kubalonda, habajimishabo ku mesu kuenu; kanukonkanganyi bua nzambi yabo ne

Bantu mu Budimi bua Edene Eku nkulondolola kua malu a diulu ne a buloba hakafukibuabi Mu dituku diakenza Yehowa Nzambi buloba ne diulu, midioko ya mu madimi kayakanza kudiunda ha buloba ne mashinde kâkanza kutoloka, bualu bua Yehowa Nzambi kakanza kulokesha nvula ha buloba, ne kakuakadi muntu bua kuihileye buloba, kadi dibungi diakabanda ha buloba, ne tshitelele tshiakadi ha buloba buonso

Bana ba Lubena, muan a bute wa Isalele, ku bikondo biabo, ku meku abo, ku nsubu ya batatu abo, bungi bua mena abo muntu ne muntu, ku bidimu makumi abidi tô ne ha mutu balume bonso bakamanya mua kuya mu nvita, bakabala ba mu tshisamba tshia Lubena binunu makami anai ne bisambombo ne nkama itanu
