Enza mitshi ya acacia ya kuela ku tshioshelu, lamika tshiamu tshia mitaku ku nseke yonso ya mitshi
Dina dia mukashi wa Bena Midiyana wakashihibua diakadi Kozebi, muana mukashi wa Sû, yeye wakadi ku mutu kua nsubu ya batatu abo ya mu Midiyana
mianda ya nzubu ya mu tshimenga ne ya mu musoko, ya bulongolodi ne bulami bwa njila ne bintu bia tshibûngi bia polovensa ne misoko;
Bintu ebi mbia Alona ne bana bandi balume, ne nebabidie mu muaba udi wa tshijila bualu bua bidi bitambe tshijila ku mesu kua Yehowa munkatshi mua mulambu yonso idibo bosha ha kahia
Nganyi wakubangila mukashi kayi muanze kumubaka
Yeye wakabambila ne, Lelu nakuhita bidimu lukama ne makumi abidi; tshiena mua kuya ne mua kulua kabidi; ne Yehowa wakamana kungambila ne, Wewe kuena usabuka Yadene eu

Muntu wakadi muhanduke mu bianza biabo wakaya, wakamanyisha Abalama, Muena Ebelu, wakadi ushikama hehi ne mitshi ya telebinta ya Mamale, muena Amole, muan abo ne Eshekola, muan abo ne Ane, bobo bakalamatangana ne Abalama
diepele dia masama a bipupu ne a nyama adi mwa kujiwula bantu;
Nuenu nenudie mampa adi kayi ne luevene dituku adi bualu bua nakahatula bisumbu bienu mu buloba bua Ejipitu, nunku nenujidile dituku edi bu tshivulukidi tshienu tshiendelele
Nunku, yeye wakihata mulume, wakateka bakeluba ku esete kua budimi bua Edene ne muele wa nvita wa kalua wakadi utshinguluka ku nseke yonso, bua kulamabo nshila wa ku mutshi wa muoyo
Isaka tatu andi wakamukonka ne, Wewe udi nganyi

Hanuatangila malenda au, nuvuluke mikenji ya Yehowa, nuyenze, kanulondi mitshima yenu ne mesu enu adi anuenzesha malu a masandi, nuenu nuvuluke mikenji yanyi yonso, nuyenze, nuikale bantu ba tshijila kudi Nzambi wenu
Nenunyukule mulambu wa mukata wakelabo ne bukula buakaboteshabo diambedi, nenufile mulambu eu bu mulambu wa bintu biakahuolabo
Bakabika hatshiatshia, bakahanda ku mutu kua mukuna mule bakamba ne, Tudiku, netuye ku muaba wakatulaya Yehowa, bualu bua tuakenza bualu bubi

Kanungu ka Dipangadika dia kulondeshisha ne dia kufunda Mulombodi wa ditunga ne Minisitila kavulambedi badi badieelela tukanda kudi tshitupa tshinene tshia bia bisatu bibidi bia beena Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga badi benza Tshisangilu tshinene bilondeshila dikasa dia kulonda dilongolola kudi dîyi diludiki dia mianda ya munda mwaatshi
Ku butshiama bua luhangu ku luseke lua ku wesete, enza bilulu bidi bituangane tô ne ku coudées makumi atanu, ne makunshi dikumi ne nkanu dikumi
Yehowa wakangambila ne, Bobo bakamba dî dimpe

Mose wakangata manyi adibo bela ha mutu, ne mashi akadi ha tshioshelu wakabimiamina ha Alona ne ha bilulu biandi ne ha bana bandi balume ne ha bilulu biabo, wakajidila Alona ne bilulu biandi ne bana bandi balume ne bilulu bia bana bandi balume bakadi n andi

Ekesode Yehowa Udi Ulaya Lufu lua Ban a Bute Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Nentume mulau umue mukuabo kudi Palo ne ha buloba bua Ejipitu; ne ku nyima yeye neanulekele, hanulekeleye, yeye neanuihate tshiendelele
Mukelenge wa Edome wakamuambila ne, Nansha, kanuena nuhita, nendue kusangana n ebe ne muele wa nvita

Kadi mukashi ne mukashi nealombe mukashi udi ushikama ha buihi n andi, ne mukashi udi ushikama mu nsubu wandi, bintu bia argent ne bia or ne bilulu, nuenu nenubiluatshishe bana benu ba balume ne bana benu ba bakashi, nunku nenuhaule Bena Ejipitu
Nunku netufue bua tshinyi
Wewe newenze manyi a tshijila adibo bela ha mutu ne bintu ebi, manyi adi atua dihembu bu mudibo benza kudi benyi ba manananshi, manyi au neikale manyi a tshijila adibo bela ha mutu

Nyama udi mufofo, anyi ne mifuba mitshibuke, anyi udi ujeka, anyi udi ne mputa, anyi udi ne tshikutu, anyi udi ne bilamulamu, kanufidi nyama ei kudi Yehowa bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia ha tshioshelu tshia Yehowa
Kanungu ka Kabadi ka bukubi bwa Mbulamatadi bwenzeji
Yeye wakamba ne, Muntu kai wakadi kuambila Abalahama ne, Sala neamushe bana mabele
Tshidi tshienzekela, bilondangana, ku polovensa ne ku polovensa
Nunku uditshihe n anyi kudi Nzambi bua wewe kundingi, nansha muan anyi mulume, nansha muana wa muan anyi, kadi ungenzele malu ne luse bu munakakuenzela wewe ne buloba bûdi mushikame
Wakenza malonga a mesa, ne nkuta ne bihanza ne bibuikilu bia bintu ebi ne tshiamu tshia or nkayandi

Yetelo, tatu muenu wa Mose, wakangata Sipola, mukashi wa Mose, hakadiye mumutume, ne bana bandi balume babidi, dina dia mukuabo ne, Geshoma, bualu bua Mose wakamba ne, Nakadi muenyi mu buloba bua bende
Mu dituku dinudi nunyukula bintu, nenufile muana mulume wa mukoko wa tshidimu tshimue udi kayi ne tshilema bu mulambu wa kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia
Kuyi ha buihi ne muan enu bua kumuvula bilulu biandi, meme ndi Yehowa
Muhika wa Abalahama wakahatula bilenga bia argent ne bia or ne bilulu, Wakabikila kudi Lebeka, yeye wakaha muan abo mulume ne mamu wandi kabidi bintu bia mushinga mukole
Muntu kangatshi mabue adibo bahela n au manvua, anyi dibue dia mpelu bu tshieya; bualu bua budi bu muntu udi ufila muoyo wandi bu tshieya
Yosefe wakalua ne Yakoba, tatu andi, wakamuteka ku mpala kua Palô, ne Yakoba wakavudishila Palo disanka
MUTU WA MUKANDA VI: Bidi bitangila bishimikidi bia ditwa nabi mungalata mpanda Kanungu ka Mbâsa Kasumbu kakese kadikadile komekela mianda ya Masungulangana Ditunga kadi kamanyika mu mêyi a ditunga
Bantu aba Mose ne Alona tuakambila Palo, mukelenge wa Ejipitu, ne, Lekela Bena Isalele mu Ejipitu Ka Mose ne Alona aba
Mêyi ne mikandu idi ileeja mishindu ya kulonda
Anu mu buloba bua Goshene muakadi Bena Isalele, mabue a nvula kakadiku

Kanungu ka Musangu nansha umwe, ne nansha mene pikalabo bateeka ditunga mu bukalenga bwa tshimpitshimpi anyi bwa bilwilu bilondeshila tunungu twa ne twa Dîyi dikulu edi, kabeena mwa kulengulula mapa ne ngenyi miludiki ya nshindamenu idi ilonda eyi to: mapa a kwikala ne mutu ku nshingu ; dikandika dia tshikisu ne dikengeshangana anyi tshinyangu, ditangila muntu bu nyama, dimupula dia mishinga; dikandika dia bupika ne tshinyangu, lungenyi luludiki lwa kufila bibawu ne manyooka anu adi mêyi ne mikandu mitabija; bukookeshi bwa kudisungila ne bwa kutontolola dipangadika; dikandika dia dieela mu lukanu bwa mabanza, budikadidi bwa kweela meji, bwa kusungula bwîmpe ne bubi ne bwa ditabuuja
Noa wakabuela mu buatu ne mukashi wandi ne bana bandi balume ne bakashi ba bana bandi, bualu bua mai akavulangana
Hakikila nyunyu ya bikololo ha bitalu ebi, Abalama wakayihata
Ne nyama idi mimpe ne nyama idi kayiyi mimpe ne nyunvu ne tshintu tshionso tshidi tshidikoka hanshi, bintu bibidi bintu bibidi, bilume ne bikashi, biakabuela ne Noa mu buatu, bu muakambila Nzambi Noa
Kanungu ka Butontolodi bwa beena tshidiidi budi bwanyishibwa mu Ditunga dia Kongu wa Mungalata
Udi ujadika pa diludika dieenda, lwendu lululama lwa bukalenga bwa Mbulamatadi ne lwa bishimikidi pamwe ne ntungunukilu wa Mbulamatadi
Buesha mitshi ei mu nkanu idi ku nseke ibidi ya tshioshelu bua kutshituala

Badi mwa kunyenga muntu bintu biende anu padibio biambulwisha bantu bônso nangananga anu bu bôbu mwa kumupingajila kumpala kwa biônso lupetu lukumbanangana bwa kumusamba bilondeshila bulongolodi bwa mêyi ne mikandu
Muenyi udi ushikama munkatshi muenu ikale bu muntu udi muledibue mu nsubu yenu, numusue bu munudi badisue, bualu bua nuenu nuakadi benyi mu buloba bua Ejipitu meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu

Mu matuku adi ku mpala, buimpe buanyi nebumbingishe hawalua bua kunkonka bua difutu dianyi didi kûdi, biwasangana mbushi udi kayi ne matoba, anyi mukoko udi kauyi mufike munkatshi mua bintu bianyi, nebikale bu tshintu tshiakuibabo

Hanualongolola mulume wa ngombe bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia anyi bu mulambu wa kushikisha kuditshiha anyi bu mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala kudi Yehowa, nebafile mulambu wa bukula bubotesha bu bituha bisatu bia ha dikumi busangisha ne tshituha tshia dikoho dia manyi, nebafile kabidi tshituha tshia dikoho dia nvinyo bu mulambu udibo banua, bu mulambu wa kuosha, bua kûtuisha dihembu kudi Yehowa
Mêyi a ditunga adi aleeja mushindu wa kusanka ne budikadidi ebu
Bualu bua Yehowa wakamba ne, Bobo nebafue mu tshihela

Bena Isalele bakatuma miloho kudi Sihona, mukelenge wa Bena Amole, ne, Witabushe bua tuetu tuhitshile ku buloba buebe, katuena tusesuka mu madimi anyi mu madimi a tumuma, katuena tunua mai a mena a mai anuakumbula, netulonde anu mu musesu wa mukelenge tô ne hatuahita ku butshika bua buloba buebe

Nebashihe ngombe webe ku mesu kuebe, ne wewe kuena udia munyinyi wandi; nebanyenge mpunda webe ku mesu kuebe ku bukole, ne kabena bakuhingishileye; nebahe badi n ebe lukuna mikoko yebe, kakuena muntu wa kunusungila
Mose wakakebakeba mbushi wa mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi, ne monai, bakamana kuwosha
Bakidikisha nseke yonso ne luidi lumue, bakatshibula tshilulu, buludi buatshi buakadi bunene bua ntanta wa tshianza ne butshiama buatshi buakadi bunene bua ntanta wa tshianza
Muanjelo wa Nzambi wakungambila mu tshiota tshianyi ne, Yakoba, nakuitaba ne, Ndiku
Bualu kai Yehowa udi ulua n etu ku buloba ebu bua kutushihesha ku miele ya nvita
Kabeena mwa kufunda muntu bwa bwaalu anyi bwa tshipwa mooyi tshidi katshiyi tshikala tshibawu dîba divwatshio tshienzeka ne dîba dia bilumbu
Nempe bantu aba dikasa dimpe kudi Bena Ejipitu, ne hayabo, kabena baye ne bianza bituhu

Balahanana, muana wa Akabô, wakafua ne Hada wakadia bukelenge buandi, dina dia musoko wandi ne, Pau, dina dia mukashi wandi diakadi Mahetabela, muana wa bakashi wa Mateledi, muana wa bakashi wa Mezehaba
Wakateka tshiowelu hankatshi ha ntenta wa kusambakena ne tshioshelu tshia mulambu ya kuosha, wakelamu mai a kuowa, akadi Mose ne Alona ne bana bandi balume bowesha n au bianza ne makasa

Nudie tshintu tshia dikumi tshia manvua enu ne tshia nvinyo yenu mihia mihia ne tshia manyi enu ne tshia ban a bute ba ngombe yenu ne tshia ba mikoko yenu ku mpala kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, mu muaba udiye Usungula bua kujadikamu dina diandi; nunku nenubale bualu bua kutshina Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, matuku onso

Kanungu ka Ditunga dia Kongu wa Mungalata didi mwa kutwa ndondu anyi kusheemeja diumvwangana, kudisanga anyi kuditeeka mu tshisumbu tshidi tshitekesha budishikaminyi bwadio bwa kuyisha bobumwe bwa bukwa mufika
Genese Tshibumba tshia Babela Bantu bonso ba ha buloba bakadi ne muaku umue ne mei amue

mapa, maneema a bu muntu Tshibawu tshia budimu Budikadidi bwa teletwale yônso mu buludiki bwa ditunga Mungalata Tshipwita munwamfwanka Dekele, dipangadika dia mfumu wa ditunga Bubanji Mbulamatadi Mbulamatadi mwenza kudi mêyi ne mikandu Bukalenga bwa bilwilu Bukalenga bwa tshimpitshimpi Bitupa bia buludiki bwa ditunga et Masungulangana madilekelela, a patoka ne a mungalata
Bena Amaleka ne Bena Kanâna badi bashikama mu tshibanda, makelela nuhingane, yai mu tshihela mu nshila wa ku Dishiba Dikunze
Hakalela Pelege Leu, yeye wakashala ne muoyo bidimu nkama ibidi ne tshitema, wakalela bana balume ne bana bakashi
Yeye wakalongolola dikalu diandi, wakaya ne bantu bandi
Nakambila Yoshua ku tshikondo atshi ne, Mesu ebe akatangila malu onso akenzela Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, bakelenge aba babidi: Yehowa nênzele makelenge onso nunku a kunudi nuya

Yehowa wakasomba n enu mpala ha mpala ha mukuna munkatshi mua kahia, Meme nakimana hankatshi henu ne Yehowa tshikondo atshi, bua kunulesha dî dia Yehowa; nuenu nuakatshina bualu bua kahia, kanuakabanda ku mukuna; yeye wakamba ne, Meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanuhatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu ne mu nsubu wa lukanu
Kadi kafila mwaku mudiku kamona mu mianda ya dilomba dia luse
Muakuidi neabioshe ha tshioshelu etshi ntshintu tshia kudia tshidibo bafila bu mulambu wa kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia
Nudiundishe mudimu wabo, bawenze, nunku kabitabushi mei a mashimi

Nansha nanku, tshingenyingenyi, dilomba anyi difwanyikija badi badifidila dieebeja dia beena ditunga anu padi Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka ne tshia batshipwita bakulumpa tshibweeja Tshisangilu tshinene tshitabuja dilomba ku bûngi bwa bantu bwa bia bitanu bisâtu bia batshipwita
Kadi biamueneka munyinyi wa mubidi mubishe, yeye kena muakane

Padibo babakengela, beena bukalenga bunene badi ne tshia kubweela mu midimu ya Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka ne mu ya batshipwika bakulumpe, kwangatamu tshikolokolo ne kupeesha batshipwita mûmvwija ônso adibo babaloomba pa midimu yabo
mianda ya batshikuma mbila, tshisanji, televizio, matanda a bindidimbi;
Bu muakajimisha Yehowa bisamba bikuabo ku mpala kuenu, nunku nuenu nenujimine, bualu bua nuenu nuakahidia kunvua dî dia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Nenvuishe mikete yanyi bu mukuatshiki wa maluvu bualu bua mashi abo, ne muele wanyi wa nvita neudie munyinyi wabo ne mashi a bafue ne a bena lukanu, ne mitu ya bukelenge ba bena lukuna

Ndi nkusengelela ne, Nuitabushe bua tuetu tuhite ku buloba buenu, katuena tuhita mu madimi anyi mu madimi a tumuma, katuena tunua mai a mena a mai anuakumbula, netuye anu mu musesu wa mukelenge, katuena tusesuka ku tshianza tshia balume anyi ku tshianza tshia bakashi tô ne hakahita butshika buenu
Kayena mu diulu bua nuenu nuambe ne, Nganyi neahande mu diulu bua kulua ne mikenji kutudi, ne bua kutunyuisha bua tuetu kuyenza

Biamueneka disama mu nsubu kabidi hashikisheye kumusha mabue ne kukuona munda mua nsubu ne hajinguileye makuabo, muakuidi nealue bua kutangila, ne bikala disama ditampakane mu nsubu, edi ndisama dia nsudi didi mu nsubu, nsubu kena muakane
Nutshiase bu bintu binakakulesha ne bu tshidikishilu tshia tshitendelelu ne bu tshidikishilu tshia bintu bia kutekamu
Biadia muntu tshintu tshia tshijila ku mpukahuka, yeye neasangishe tshintu tshitanu ha mutu hatshi, neahe muakuidi tshintu tshia tshijila
Dîyi dilongolodi didi difila tuludiki twa bilumbulwilu bia basalayi
nemmuambile ne, Yehowa wakatuhatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu ne mu nsubu wa lukanu ku bukole bua tshianza tshiandi
Yeye wakamba ne, Unvuai mei anyi, bikala muprofete munkatshi muenu, meme Yehowa nendimanyishe kudiye mu tshikena kumona, meme nensombe n andi mu tshilota
Etshi ntshidimu tshia disanka dinene, netshikale tshidimu tshia tshijila kunudi, nenudie bintu bidi bidimenena mu madimi

Muakuidi neatangile ha disama, neateke tshintu tshidi ne disama edi ha buatshi tô matuku muanda mutekete, halua dituku dia muanda mutekete, yeye neatangile ha disama, bikala disama ditampakane mu tshilulu, nansha mu milongo ya buludi nansha mu milongo ya butshiama, nansha mu tshiseba tshidibo benza n atshi mudimu edi ndisama dia nsudi; tshintu etshi katshiena tshiakane
Nuenze mitshi yenu ya tumuma tukese nunku ne mitshi ya olive kabidi
nennuvudishile disanka dianyi tshidimu tshisambombo, ne buloba nebukuame bintu bia bidimu bisatu
Bana balume ba Yosefe ku meku abo, Manashe ne Efelayima
Wa mu tshisamba tshia Nafatale, Nabi, muana mulume wa Wofesi

Nudimuke, kanuedianganyi meji mabi mu mitshima yenu ne, Tshidimu tshia muanda mutekete, tshidibo balekelelangana bintu tshikadi ha kulua, ne kanuenzedi muan enu muhele bibi, bua kubenga kumuha tshintu; bua kadidi kudi Yehowa bualu buebe, ne bua wewe kushadi ne bubi
Kadi hanalala tulu mu lufu ne bankambua banyi, hashishe umuka n anyi mu Ejipitu, uye kunjika mu muaba wakabajikabo Yeye wakamba ne, Nengenze bu muwakuamba

Yehowa wakamuambila ne, Bisamba bibidi bidi munda muebe, bisamba bibidi bia bantu nebiluhuke munda muebe tshisamba tshimue netshitambe tshisamba tshikuabo bukole, ne mukulu neakuatshile muakuny andi mudimu

Kanungu ka Too ne pikalabo bateeka Kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu, Kapangu ka Mbulamatadi ne Kabadi kashipi ka mêyi, Kabadi ka ku mutu ka bandumbulula, tudi twenze midimu idibu batulongolwela kudi Dîyi dikulu edi
Yeye wakabakoma nyima, wakadia, ne yeye wakatshinguluka kudibo, wakayikila n abo, wakakuata Shimeona, wakamusuika ku mesu kuabo
Bwa kufunda muntu yônso, kumukwata, kumwela mu lukanu anyi kumupiisha, bidi bikengela anu kulonda mêyi ne mikandu mu mushindu udiwu alongolola
Kanusangishi mei ha mutu ha dî dinakanuambila, kanumushi mei ku dî adi; bua nuenu nutumikile mikenji ya Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, Nakanuambila

Malu Makole Neakuate Bashihi ba Mikenji Kadi binuikala kanuyi nunvua dî dia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua kuenza mikenji yandi yonso ne mei bindi nnuambila lelu, hashishe milau ei yonso neyilue kunudi, neyinukuate
Uteke nsonga ibidi ya tukanu tuhindakasha ku bilulu bia efoda bidi ha maha, ku mpala kuabi
Mose wakambila Yehowa ne, Wewe wakenzela mundi webe bibi nunku bualu kai
Hakakumbana matuku makumi anai Noa wakunzulula ha disoso dia buatu diakenzeye
dilongolola dia mêyi maludiki a mianda ya tulasa adibo ne tshia kulonda mu teletwale yônso ya ditunga;
Yeye kena ne bualu bua kudiangatshila bakashi ba bungi bua kukudimuneye mutshima wandi; yeye kena ne bualu bua kudikumbashila biamu bia argent ne bia or
Bakalua mu tshibanda tshia Eshekola, bakakosamu ditamba diakadi ne tshisumbu tshia mamuma a nvinyo, bakadituala ku mutshi babidi, balualua ne mamuma makuabo a grenade ne a nfigi
Yeye wakadia bikole, Bena Ejipitu ne bantu ba mu nsubu wa Palô bakunvua muadi wandi
Bantu bonso batu benza malu mabi au nebumushibue munkatshi mua bana babo
Bakelenge ba mu Isalele, bakadi ku mutu kua nsubu ya batatu abo, bakafua bintu
Nebadie munyinyi mu nsubu umue, kanuhatuki ne munyinyi ku nsubu, kanutshibudi nansha mufuba umue

Padi nkwaasa mushaala mutupu anyi padi Kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu katundubula ne tshipumbishi tshidi tshia kashidi, disungula dia Mulombodi wa Ditunga mupiamupia didi dienzeka bilondeshila dilomba dia Kasumbu Kadikadile komekela Mianda ya Masungulangana mu ditunga, mu matuku kaayi mashadila ku makumi asambombo anyi kaayi mapita pa matuku makumi tshiteema, panyima pa disokola dia diikala ditupu dia nkwaasa anyi dia ditundubula dia tshipumbisha tshia kashidi
Bualu bua meme nengambe dina dia Yehowa: tumbishai bunene bua Nzambi wetu
Umpe bakashi banyi ne bana banyi, banakakukuatshila mudimu, undekele, nenye, bualu bua wewe udi mumanye mudimu unakukuenzela
Nengolole tshianza tshianyi, nembakengeshe ne malu a kukema; ne ku nyima kua malu â yeye neanulekele

Nomba Kutomboka kua Kola Kola, muana mulume wa Yiseha, muana mulume wa Kohata, muana mulume wa Lewi, ne Datana ne Abilama, bana balume ba Eliaba, ne Ono, muana mulume wa Pelete, bana balume ba Lubena, bakabika ne Bena Isalele bakuabo ne bakelenge ba mu tshisumbu bu nkama ibidi ne makumi atanu, bantu bakadi ne lumu lunene, bakadisangisha bua kufuilangana ne Mose ne Alona, bakabambila ne, Nudi nutamba kudienzela malu, bualu bua bantu bonso mbantu ba tshijila ne Yehowa udi munkatshi muabo nuenu nudi nudibandisha ku mutu kua bantu ba Yehowa munyi
Mose wakamba ne, Wewe wakuamba bimpe, tshiena utangila mpala webe kabidi
Bantu bonso nebunvue mei abo, nebatshine, kabena benza malu a tshitshu kabidi

Mose wakabatuma bua kutentekela buloba bua Kanâna, wakabambila ne, Yilai ku nshila wa luseke lua Sude, yai bienu mu buloba bua mikuna nutangile buloba ne budi munyi, bantu badimu badi bakole anyi badi batekete, badi banya banya anyi badi ba bungi: buloba budi munyi budibo bashikama, budi buimpe anyi budi bubi, misoko idibo bashikamamu idi ya hatuhu anyi idi ya mpangu ya mabue, nutangile buloba ne budi ne bufunfule anyi budi busenguluke, mitangile ne mudi metu, anyi kaenamu
Hakatantamaneye, muana umue wakahatula tshianza, ne muleleshi wakasuika muonshi mukunze ku tshianza tshiandi, wakamba ne, Yeye wakaluhuka diambedi
Yehowa wakakolesha mutshima wa Palô, yeye kakabunvuila, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Nyama ya mpunda yakadi binunu makumi asatu ne nkama itanu, ne mulambu wa Yehowa wakadi makumi asambombo ne umue
Bakasemena ha buihi Yeye wakamba ne, Ndi bianyi Yosefe, muakuny enu unuakahana mu Ejipitu
Eleazâ muana mulume wa Alona, muakuidi, neikale ku mutu kua bakelenge ba Bena Lewi, ne ku mutu kua bantu badi balama bintu bia mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu

Mose Udi Ukandika Bantu bua Kufilabo Bintu Bikuabo Mose Wakabikila Besalele ne Oholiaba ne muntu yonso wakadi ne mutshima mûsha tente ne lungenyi kudi Yehowa, ne muntu yonso wakadi ne mutshima bua kulua kuenza mudimu
Lubena wakambila tatu wandi ne, Udi mua kushiha bana banyi balume babidi, binahanga kumuhingasha kudi umufile mu tshianza tshianyi, ne meme nemmuhingashe kûdi kabidi

Tuetu tuakakudimuna mukelenge wetu di ne, Tudi ne tatu muntu mununu, ne muan etu mukuabo wakamulelabo ku bununu buandi utshidi mukese, muan abo mukuabo wa difu dimue wakafua, ne anu yeye muana umuehele kua mamu wandi udi mushale ne tatu wandi udi umunanga
Kuvudi tatu ebe anyi mamu ebe bilulu, yeye udi mamu webe, kumuvudi bilulu
Abahalama wakolola tshianza tshiandi, wakangata kele bua kushiheye n aku muan andi
Yeye wakabambila ne, Nuikale talala, kanutshinyi Nzambi, Nzambi wa tatu wenu, wakanuha bintu mu bibombi bienu, meme nakadi ne argent yenu
Bakamulesha mulambu wa kuosha, tshituha ne tshituha ne mutu, yeye wakabisha ha tshioshelu
Wakatula nkanu mai ya kuteka ku matumba a tshintu atshi bua kubueshamu mitshi

Bana balume ba Eliaba: Nemuele ne Datana ne Abilama Datana eu ne Abilama eu bakabikila tshisumbu tshia bantu, bakatanda ne Mose ne Alona mu tshisumbu tshia Kola, hakadibo batanda ne Yehowa, buloba buakubulula mukana muabu, buakabamma ne Kola, bakafua tshisumbu atshi, kahia kakosha balume aba nkama ibidi ne makumi atanu, ne bobo bakalua bu tshivulukidi kudi Bena Isalele
Mose wakambila bantu ne, Kanutshinyi, imanai, numone luhandu lua Yehowa lualueye kunuha lelu, bua Bena Ejipitu banuakumona lelu kanuena nubamona kabidi tshiendelele
Zebuluna neashikame kukala kua mai manene muaba wandi newikale muaba wa mabi manene, mukalu wandi neufike tô ne ku Sidona
Kanungu ka Muntu yônso udi ne bukookeshi bwa kulonga kalasa
Mukaji udi pende ne tshia kuleeja mpala mushidu wa momumwe mu bishimikidi bia ditunga dijima, bia polovensa ne bia misoko

Kadi nyunyu wa nkutshi kakamona muaba wa kuikala, nunku wakahingana kudiye mu buatu, bualu bua mai akatshidi ha buloba buonso, yeye wakolola tshianza tshiandi, wakamukuata, wakamuteka mu buatu muakadiye
dilonda makanyika adi atangila bukubi bwa beenyi;
Yeye wakuvuwa mai ku mpala kuandi, wakahingana kudibo, wakadikanda, wakamba ne, Lua ne bidia

Muakuidi nealue ne mashi makuabo a muana mulume wa ngombe ku nsubu wa tshitendelelu, muakuidi nealue munu wandi mu mashi, neamiamine misangu muanda mutekete ku mpala kua tshilulu tshikudika ku mesu kua Yehowa
Yehowa wakamba ne, Bualu ebu nebubitabushishe ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa bankambua babo, Nzambi wa Abalahama, Nzambi wa Isaka ne Nzambi wa Yakoba wakamueneka kudi
Umwe ne umwe udi ne tutupa twa teletwale twikala katuyi ku bukookeshi bwa Bukalenga bwa kumutu etu: tshimenga,komina, seketela ne musoko wa bamfumu ba kabukulu

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne Alona mu mukuna wa Hô, hehi ne butshika bua buloba bua Edome ne, Alona neadisangishe kudi bankambua bandi, yeye kena ubuela mu buloba bunakalaya Bena Isalele, bualu bua nuenu nuakuhidia dî dianyi ku mai a Meliba
Muntu keena mwa kwanji kufunda Mulombodi wa ditunga ne Minisitila Kavulambedi ku tubadi bwa bibawu bikalabo babûnda pambelu pa midimu yabo too ne ku tshikondo tshiaajika bumfumu bwabo
Biwasumba muhika, Muena Ebelu, yeye neakukuatshile mudimu bidimu bisambombo, ne tshidimu tshia muanda mutekete yeye neahete budishikaminyi hatuhu
Bantu bonso bakamba hohamue ne, Netuenze mei onso akutuambila Yehowa Mose wakambila Yehowa mei akamba bantu
Mukenji eu newikale kudiye ne kudi bana bandi badi banulonda ku nyima tô ne tshiendelele
Bakeluba nebolole mahuahua abo kulu, nebabuikile tshibuikilu tshia mushete ne mahuahua abo, bobo batangilangana mpala, mpala yabo neyikale mitangile ha tshibuikilu tshia mushete
Neyikale misoko ya kunyemenamu kudi Bena Isalele, ne kudi muenyi udi munkatshi muabo, hashiha muntu muntu mukuabo ku mpukahuka, neanyemenemu
Pa kumbusha bulongolodi bukwabu bwa Dîyi dikulu
Badi Bahita Bena Isalele Bukole ku Hôma Nom
Hakunvua Mose mei au, bualu ebu buakadi buimpe ku mesu kuandi
